13279939Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool WaitforExit(this Action act, int timeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        var task = Task.Factory.StartNew(act, cts.Token);Di2015NewLine        if (Task.WaitAny(new[] { task }, TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(timeout)) < 0)Di2015NewLine        { // timeoutDi2015NewLine            cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (task.Exception != null)Di2015NewLine        { // exceptionDi2015NewLine            cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine            throw task.Exception;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13282982Di2015UniqueSeparator var result=   from p in dataDi2015NewLine    group p by new Di2015NewLine   { Criterion = p.Contains(p.Group) ? "A" : p.Contains(p.Group) ? "B" : "N/a" } Di2015NewLine    into g  select new {KEY = g.Key, VALUE = g.Count()};Di2015NewLine
13283071Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool IsPrime(long candidate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Test whether the parameter is a prime number.Di2015NewLine        if ((candidate & 1) == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return candidate == 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Note:Di2015NewLine        // ... This version was changed to test the square.Di2015NewLine        // ... Original version tested against the square root.Di2015NewLine        // ... Also we exclude 1 at the very end.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 3; (i * i) <= candidate; i += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((candidate % i) == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return candidate != 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13286289Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static double ArcInMeters(double lat0, double lon0, double lat1, double lon1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double earthRadius = 6372797.560856; // mDi2015NewLine    return earthRadius * ArcInRadians(lat0, lon0, lat1, lon1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static double ArcInRadians(double lat0, double lon0, double lat1, double lon1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double latitudeArc = DegToRad(lat0 - lat1);Di2015NewLine    double longitudeArc = DegToRad(lon0 - lon1);Di2015NewLine    double latitudeH = Math.Sin(latitudeArc * 0.5);Di2015NewLine    latitudeH *= latitudeH;Di2015NewLine    double lontitudeH = Math.Sin(longitudeArc * 0.5);Di2015NewLine    lontitudeH *= lontitudeH;Di2015NewLine    double tmp = Math.Cos(DegToRad(lat0)) * Math.Cos(DegToRad(lat1));Di2015NewLine    return 2.0 * Math.Asin(Math.Sqrt(latitudeH + tmp * lontitudeH));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static double DegToRad(double x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return x * Math.PI / 180;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13287381Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<List<int>> lists = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLinelists.Add(new List<int>(new int[] { 3, 5, 7 }));Di2015NewLinelists.Add(new List<int>(new int[] { 3, 5, 6 }));Di2015NewLinelists.Add(new List<int>(new int[] { 2, 9 }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint listCount = lists.Count;Di2015NewLineList<int> indexes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < listCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    indexes.Add(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // construct valuesDi2015NewLine    int[] values = new int[listCount];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < listCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        values[i] = lists[i][indexes[i]];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(string.Join(" ", values));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // increment indexesDi2015NewLine    int incrementIndex = listCount - 1;Di2015NewLine    while (incrementIndex >= 0 && ++indexes[incrementIndex] >= lists[incrementIndex].Count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        indexes[incrementIndex] = 0;Di2015NewLine        incrementIndex--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // break conditionDi2015NewLine    if (incrementIndex < 0)Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13289681Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Collections.Concurrent
13289681Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal sealed class SynchronizedQueue<T> {Di2015NewLine    private readonly Object m_lock = new Object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<T> m_queue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Enqueue(T item) {Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Enter(m_lock);Di2015NewLine        // After enqueuing an item, wake up any/all waitersDi2015NewLine        m_queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine        Monitor.PulseAll(m_lock);Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Exit(m_lock);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Dequeue() {Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Enter(m_lock);Di2015NewLine        // Loop while the queue is empty (the condition)Di2015NewLine        while (m_queue.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Wait(m_lock);Di2015NewLine        // Dequeue an item from the queue and return it for processingDi2015NewLine        T item = m_queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Exit(m_lock);Di2015NewLine        return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13292069Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IGeometry {Di2015NewLine    void accept(IGeometryVisitor visitor);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IGeometryVisitor {Di2015NewLine    void visitCircle2D(Circle2D circle);Di2015NewLine    void visitBox2D(Box2D box);Di2015NewLine    // a method for each concrete typeDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Circle2D implements IGeometry {Di2015NewLine    public void accept(IGeometryVisitor visitor) {Di2015NewLine        visitor.visitCircle2D(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Box2D implements IGeometry {Di2015NewLine    public void accept(IGeometryVisitor visitor) {Di2015NewLine        visitor.visitBox2D(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class IntersectionVisitor implements IGeometryVisitor {Di2015NewLine    private boolean mResult;Di2015NewLine    private IGeometry mGeometry2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static boolean isOverlapping(IGeometry geometry1, IGeometry geometry2) {Di2015NewLine        return new IntersectionVisitor(geometry1, geometry2).mResult;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IntersectionVisitor(IGeometry geometry1, IGeometry geometry2) {Di2015NewLine        mGeometry2 = geometry2;Di2015NewLine        // now start the processDi2015NewLine        mGeometry1.accept(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void visitCircle2D(Circle2D circle) {Di2015NewLine        mGeometry2.accept(new Circle2DIntersector(circle));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class Circle2DIntersector implements IGeometryVisitor {Di2015NewLine        private Circle2D mCircle;Di2015NewLine        Circle2DIntersector(Circle2D circle) {Di2015NewLine            mCircle = circle;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void visitCircle2D(Circle2D circle) {Di2015NewLine            mResult = isOverlapping(mCircle, circle);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void visitBox2D(Box2D box) {Di2015NewLine            mResult = isOverlapping(mCircle, box);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class Box2DIntersector implements IGeometryVisitor {Di2015NewLine        private Box2D mBox;Di2015NewLine        Box2DIntersector(Box2D box) {Di2015NewLine            mBox = box;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void visitCircle2D(Circle2D circle) {Di2015NewLine            mResult = isOverlapping(circle, mBox);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void visitBox2D(Box2D box) {Di2015NewLine            mResult = isOverlapping(mBox, box);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // static methods to compute overlap of concrete typesDi2015NewLine    // For N concrete types there will be N*(N+1)/2 methodsDi2015NewLine    public 13294511Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace WebApplication2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class _Default : System.Web.UI.PageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine            //define some regex patterns for validating our data.Di2015NewLine            const string PHONEREGEX = @"((\\(\\d{3}\\))|(\\d{3}-))\\d{3}-\\d{4}";Di2015NewLine            const string ORDERNUMREGEX = @"\\d*";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool isValid = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string phone = Request.QueryString["phone"]; //read phone from querystring.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //validate that arg was provided, and matches our regular expression. this means it contains only numbers and single hyphensDi2015NewLine            if(!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(phone) && System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch(phone, PHONEREGEX)){Di2015NewLine                Response.Write(HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(string.Format("The phone number is {0}", phone))); //HTML Encode the value before output, to prevent any toxic markup.Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                Response.Write("Phone number not provided.");Di2015NewLine                isValid = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string orderStr = Request.QueryString["order"]; //read ordernum from querystringDi2015NewLine            long order = long.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //validate that order was provided and matches the regex meaning it is only numbers. then it parses the value into 'long order'.Di2015NewLine            if(!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(orderStr) && System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch(orderStr, ORDERNUMREGEX) && long.TryParse(orderStr, out order)){Di2015NewLine                Response.Write(HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(string.Format("The order number is {0}", order))); //use 'long order' instead of orderStr.Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                Response.Write("Order number not provided.");Di2015NewLine                isValid = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if all arguments are valid, query the DB.Di2015NewLine            if (isValid) {Di2015NewLine                Response.Write(GetOrderStatus( phone, order));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string GetOrderStatus(string phone, long order) {Di2015NewLine            string status = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create a connection objectDi2015NewLine            string connstring = "SERVER=<YOUR MYSQL SERVER>;DATABASE=<YOUR DATABASE>;UID=<YOUR USER>;PASSWORD=<YOUR PASSWORD>-";//this is a connection string for mysql. customize it to your needs.Di2015NewLine            MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlConnection conn = new MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlConnection(connstring); //put your connection string in this constructor call Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create a SQL command objectDi2015NewLine            using (MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlCommand cmd = new MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlCommand()) { //use a using clause so resources are always released when done.Di2015NewLine                cmd.Connection = conn;Di2015NewLine                cmd.CommandText = "SELECT `Order_Status` FROM `<YOUR TABLE>` WHERE `Order` = @order AND `Phone` = @phone"; //this needs a From statement Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //add parameters for your command. they fill in the @order and @phone in the sql statement above. customize these to match the data types in your database.Di2015NewLine                cmd.Parameters.Add("order", MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlDbType.Int64,11).Value = order; //do not use @ sign in parameter nameDi2015NewLine                cmd.Parameters.Add("phone", MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlDbType.VarChar, 50).Value = phone;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //execute the command, read the results from the query.Di2015NewLine                cmd.Connection.Open();Di2015NewLine                using (MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader()) {Di2015NewLine                    while (reader.Read()) {Di2015NewLine                        status = reader.GetString("Order_Status");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    cmd.Connection.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return status;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13297672Di2015UniqueSeparatorupdate
13297672Di2015UniqueSeparatorobject
13297672Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CacheManager cache = new CacheManager();Di2015NewLine        cache.AddOrGetExisting("item", () => new Test());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // let one thread modify the itemDi2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(s =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(250);Di2015NewLine            cache.Update<Test>("item", i =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                i.First = "CHANGED";Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine                i.Second = "CHANGED";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return i;Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // let one thread just read the item and print itDi2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(s =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var item = ((Lazy<object>)cache.Get("item")).Value;Di2015NewLine            Log(item.ToString());Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine            Log(item.ToString());Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class TestDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private string _first = "Initial value";Di2015NewLine        public string FirstDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _first; }Di2015NewLine            set { _first = value; Log("First", value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string _second = "Initial value";Di2015NewLine        public string SecondDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _second; }Di2015NewLine            set { _second = value; Log("Second", value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("--> PRINTING: First: [{0}], Second: [{1}]", First, Second);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Log(string message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Thread {0}: {1}", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Log(string property, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Thread {0}: {1} property was changed to [{2}]", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, property, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13297842Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void comboBox_SelectedValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e){Di2015NewLine    //Fill the comboboxesDi2015NewLine    ComboBox comboBox = (ComboBox)sender;Di2015NewLine    if(comboBox.SelectedItem != null){Di2015NewLine      foreach(ComboBox cb in comboboxes)Di2015NewLine        cb.Items.Remove(comboBox.SelectedItem);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13297842Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void comboBox_SelectedValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e){Di2015NewLine   foreach(ComboBox cb in comboBoxes){Di2015NewLine      //Here listItems is a list of elements you added firstly to the comboboxesDi2015NewLine      if(cb.Items.Count < listItems.Count)Di2015NewLine         foreach(object item in listItems){ Di2015NewLine             if(!cb.Items.Contains(item))Di2015NewLine               cb.Items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Remove the selected items in all the comboboxesDi2015NewLine   ComboBox comboBox = (ComboBox)sender;Di2015NewLine   if(comboBox.SelectedItem != null){Di2015NewLine      for(int i = 0; i < comboBoxes.Count; i++){Di2015NewLine         for(int j = 0; j < comboBoxes.Count; j++){Di2015NewLine            if(i != j && comboBoxes[j].SelectedItem != null && comboBoxes[j].Contains(comboBoxes[j].SelectedItem))Di2015NewLine              comboBoxes[i].Items.Remove(comboBoxes[j].SelectedItem);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

/ (n * 5)), (j * 5) * (yreal / (m * 5))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (i == n-1)Di2015NewLine                        pt.X = this.ClientRectangle.Width -                 min = pts[i, j].Z;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine x;Di2015NewLine            this.Y = y;Di2015NewLine            this.Z = z;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DrawContour(Graphics g, Point3F[,] pts, float zmin, float zmax, int ncount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var aPen = new Pen(Color.DimGray) {Width = 0.25f})Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var pta = new PointF[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var zlevels = new float[ncount];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < ncount; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                zlevels[i] = zmin + i*(zmax - zmin)/(ncount - 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int i0, i1, i2, j0, j1, j2;Di2015NewLine            float zratio = 1; // Draw contour on the XY plane:Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < pts.GetLength(0) - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < pts.GetLength(1) - 1; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int k = 0; k < ncount; k++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Left triangle:Di2015NewLine                        i0 = i;Di2015NewLine                        j0 = j;Di2015NewLine                        i1 = i;Di2015NewLine                        j1 = j + 1;Di2015NewLine                        i2 = i + 1;Di2015NewLine                        j2 = j + 1;Di2015NewLine                        if ((zlevels[k] >= pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i1, j1].Z ||Di2015NewLine                             zlevels[k] < pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i1, j1].Z) &&Di2015NewLine                            (zlevels[k] >= pts[i1, j1].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i2, j2].Z ||Di2015NewLine                             zlevels[k] < pts[i1, j1].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i2, j2].Z))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i0, j0].Z)/(pts[i1, j1].Z - pts[i0, j0].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[0] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i0, j0].X, (1 - zratio)*pts[i0, j0].Y + zratio*pts[i1, j1].Y);Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i1, j1].Z)/(pts[i2, j2].Z - pts[i1, j1].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[1] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF((1 - zratio)*pts[i1, j1].X + zratio*pts[i2, j2].X, pts[i1, j1].Y);Di2015NewLine                            g.DrawLine(aPen, pta[0], pta[1]);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else if ((zlevels[k] >= pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i2, j2].Z ||Di2015NewLine                                  zlevels[k] < pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i2, j2].Z) &&Di2015NewLine                                 (zlevels[k] >= pts[i1, j1].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i2, j2].Z ||Di2015NewLine                                  zlevels[k] < pts[i1, j1].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i2, j2].Z))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i0, j0].Z)/(pts[i2, j2].Z - pts[i0, j0].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[0] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF((1 - zratio)*pts[i0, j0].X + zratio*pts[i2, j2].X,Di2015NewLine                                           (1 - zratio)*pts[i0, j0].Y + zratio*pts[i2, j2].Y);Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i1, j1].Z)/(pts[i2, j2].Z - pts[i1, j1].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[1] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF((1 - zratio)*pts[i1, j1].X + zratio*pts[i2, j2].X, pts[i1, j1].Y);Di2015NewLine                            g.DrawLine(aPen, pta[0], pta[1]);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else if ((zlevels[k] >= pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i1, j1].Z ||Di2015NewLine                                  zlevels[k] < pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i1, j1].Z) &&Di2015NewLine                                 (zlevels[k] >= pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i2, j2].Z ||Di2015NewLine                                  zlevels[k] < j0].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[0] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i0, j0].X, (1 - zratio)*pts[i0, j0].Y + zratio*pts[i1, j1].Y)Di2015NewLine                                ;Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i0, j0].Z)/(pts[i2, j2].Z - pts[i0, j0].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[1] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i0, j0].X*(1 - zratio) + pts[i2, j2].X*zratio,Di2015NewLine                                           pts[i0, j0].Y*(1 - zratio) + pts[i2, i;Di2015NewLine                        j0 = j;Di2015NewLine                        i1 = i + 1;Di2015NewLine                        j1 = j;Di2015NewLine                        i2 = i + 1;Di2015NewLine                        j2 = j + 1;Di2015NewLine                        if ((zlevels[k] >= pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i1, j1].Z ||Di2015NewLine                             zlevels[k] < pts[i0, j0].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[0] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i0, j0].X*(1 - zratio) + pts[i1, j1].X*zratio, pts[i0, j0].Y);Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i1, j1].Z)/(pts[i2, j2].Z - pts[i1, j1].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[1] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i1, j1].X, pts[i1, j1].Y*(1 - zratio) + pts[i2, j2].Y*zratio);Di2015NewLine                            g.DrawLine(aPen, pta[0], pta[1]);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else if ((zlevels[k] >= pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i2, j2].Z ||Di2015NewLine                                  zlevels[k] < pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i2, j2].Z) &&Di2015NewLine                                 (zlevels[k] >= pts[i1, j1].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i2, j2].Z ||Di2015NewLine                                  zlevels[k] < pts[i1, j1].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i2, j2].Z))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i0, j0].Z)/(pts[i2, j2].Z - pts[i0, j0].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[0] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i0, j0].X*(1 - zratio) + pts[i2, j2].X*zratio,Di2015NewLine                                           pts[i0, j0].Y*(1 - zratio) + pts[i2, j2].Y*zratio);Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i1, j1].Z)/(pts[i2, j2].Z - pts[i1, j1].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[1] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i1, j1].X, pts[i1, j1].Y*(1 - zratio) + pts[i2, j2].Y*zratio);Di2015NewLine                            g.DrawLine(aPen, pta[0], pta[1]);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else if ((zlevels[k] >= pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i1, j1].Z ||Di2015NewLine                                  zlevels[k] < pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i1, j1].Z) &&Di2015NewLine                                 (zlevels[k] >= pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] < pts[i2, j2].Z ||Di2015NewLine                                  zlevels[k] < pts[i0, j0].Z && zlevels[k] >= pts[i2, j2].Z))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i0, j0].Z)/(pts[i1, j1].Z - pts[i0, j0].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[0] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i0, j0].X*(1 - zratio) + pts[i1, j1].X*zratio, pts[i0, j0].Y);Di2015NewLine                            zratio = (zlevels[k] - pts[i0, j0].Z)/(pts[i2, j2].Z - pts[i0, j0].Z);Di2015NewLine                            pta[1] =Di2015NewLine                                new PointF(pts[i0, j0].X*(1 - zratio) + pts[i2, j2].X*zratio,Di2015NewLine                                           pts[i0, j0].Y*(1 - zratio) + pts[i2, j2].Y*zratio);Di2015NewLine                            g.DrawLine(aPen, pta[0], pta[1]);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Color GetColor(float value, float maxValue, float minValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Convert into a value between 0 and 1023.Di2015NewLine        int int_value = (int) (1023*(value - maxValue)/(minValue - maxValue));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Map different color bands.Di2015NewLine        if (int_value < 256)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Red to yellow. (255, 0, 0) to (255, 255, 0).Di2015NewLine            return Color.FromArgb(255, int_value, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (int_value < 512)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Yellow to green. (255, 255, 0) to (0, 255, 0).Di2015NewLine            int_value -= 256;Di2015NewLine            return Color.FromArgb(255 - int_value, 255, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (int_value < 768)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Green to aqua. (0, 255, 0) to (0, 255, 255).Di2015NewLine            int_value -= 512;Di2015NewLine            return Color.FromArgb(0, 255, int_value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Aqua to blue. (0, 255, 255) to (0, 0, 255).Di2015NewLine            int_value -= 768;Di2015NewLine            return Color.FromArgb(0, 255 - int_value, 255);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DrawColor(Graphics g, Point3F[,] pts, float zmin, float zmax)Di2015NewLine    {          Di2015NewLine        var pta = new PointF[4];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < pts.GetLength(0) - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < pts.GetLength(1) - 1; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pta[0] = new PointF(pts[i, j].X, pts[i, j].Y);Di2015NewLine                pta[1] = new PointF(pts[i, j + 1].X, pts[i, j + 1].Y);Di2015NewLine                pta[2] = new PointF(pts[i + 1, j + 1].X, pts[i + 1, j + 1].Y);Di2015NewLine                pta[3] = new PointF(pts[i + 1, j].X, pts[i + 1, j].Y);Di2015NewLine                using (var aBrush = new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(200, GetColor(pts[i, j].Z, zmin, zmax))))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    g.FillPolygon(aBrush, pta);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13308427Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetFromTextCommand(string command)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_isConnected)Di2015NewLine                Connect();Di2015NewLine            if (!_isConnected)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SendTextCommand(command);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string response = GetFromTextCommand();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (response.StartsWith("202"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (!response.EndsWith(".\\r\\n"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string newResponse = GetFromTextCommand();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    response += newResponse;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return response;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) { GenerateException(ex.Message); return null; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string GetFromTextCommand()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_isConnected)Di2015NewLine                Connect();Di2015NewLine            if (!_isConnected)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string response = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SocketAsyncEventArgs socketEventArg = new SocketAsyncEventArgs();Di2015NewLine            socketEventArg.RemoteEndPoint = _socket.RemoteEndPoint;Di2015NewLine            socketEventArg.UserToken = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            socketEventArg.SetBuffer(new Byte[MAX_BUFFER_SIZE], 0, MAX_BUFFER_SIZE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            socketEventArg.Completed += new EventHandler<SocketAsyncEventArgs>(delegate(object s, SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (e.SocketError == SocketError.Success)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    response = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(e.Buffer);Di2015NewLine                    response = response.Trim('\\0');Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    throw new Exception(e.SocketError.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _pausingThread.Set();Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _pausingThread.Reset();Di2015NewLine            _socket.ReceiveAsync(socketEventArg);Di2015NewLine            _pausingThread.WaitOne(TIMEOUT_MILLISECONDS);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return response;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) { GenerateException(ex.Message); 13311791Di2015UniqueSeparator// this variable will have the data read from the server after all is said and doneDi2015NewLineList<KeyValuePair<int, string>>> data = new List<KeyValuePair<int, string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// create the connection (replace connection string as necessary)Di2015NewLineusing (DB2Connection conn = new DB2Connection("database connection string"))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // specify the query, create and open the command object Di2015NewLine    string qry = "Select distinct Value, Descrip from cool";Di2015NewLine    DB2Command cmd = new DB2Command(qry, conn);Di2015NewLine    conn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // calling ExecuteReader() sends the query to the database and starts Di2015NewLine    // the process of reading the dataDi2015NewLine    using(DB2DataReader read = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // you have to call Read() for every row. It will return false if there Di2015NewLine        // are no more rows leftDi2015NewLine        while(read.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // calling the various Get methods is how you get the data out of the readerDi2015NewLine            // note that you pass in the index of the column for each callDi2015NewLine            int intVal = read.GetInt32(0);Di2015NewLine            string strVal = read.GetString(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // now you're ready to create your KeyValuePair objectDi2015NewLine            KeyValuePair<int, string> tmp = new KeyVauePair<int, string>(intVal, strVal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // And add it to the list we defined at the start of thisDi2015NewLine            data.Add(tmp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// and now we've got all of the data from your query wrapped up into a nice listDi2015NewLine// called 'data'. Do with it whatever you planned Di2015NewLine

13312113Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Combinations<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = 1;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var innerSequence in source.Skip(count).Combinations(n - 1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new T[] { item }.Concat(innerSequence);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var wordApplication = new Application() { Visible = true };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Open document ADi2015NewLine the documentDi2015NewLine            const string myText = "My Text Before The List";Di2015NewLine            foreach (List list in documentA.Lists)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine (prevRange == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Insert new paragraphDi2015NewLine                    listRange.InsertParagraphBefore();Di2015NewLine prevRange.InsertBefore(myText);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save, quit, donesDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Dones");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            documentA.Save();Di2015NewLine            wordApplication.Quit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine 13327384Di2015UniqueSeparator  public string FrecquincyWordBuilder()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string fromatedWords = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine      this.myWords.SortByFrequency();Di2015NewLine      Dictionary<string, int> wordsAndFec = this.myWords.wordsAsDictionary();Di2015NewLine      return GroupWordsByFercs(wordsAndFec);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static string GroupWordsByFercs(Dictionary<string, int> wordsAndFec)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      String formatedWords = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine      var groups =Di2015NewLine          from w in wordsAndFecDi2015NewLine          group w by w.Value;Di2015NewLine      foreach (var group in groups)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          formatedWords += ("\\n Words ocurring " + group.Key + " times:\\n");Di2015NewLine          foreach (var w in group)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              formatedWords += (w.Key + " ");Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return formatedWords;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

13327856Di2015UniqueSeparator    int Columns = 4;Di2015NewLine    int LineLength = 80;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteGroup(String[] group)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // determine the column width given the number of columns and the line widthDi2015NewLine        int columnWidth = LineLength / Columns;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < group.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i > 0 && i % Columns == 0)Di2015NewLine            {   // Finished a complete line; write a new-line to start on the next oneDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (group[i].Length > columnWidth)Di2015NewLine            {   // This word is too long; truncate it to the column widthDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(group[i].Substring(0, columnWidth));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {   // Write out the word with spaces padding it to fill the column widthDi2015NewLine                Console.Write(group[i].PadRight(columnWidth));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13328829Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int GetRoleInstanceNumber()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!RoleEnvironment.IsAvailable)Di2015NewLine        return 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var roleInstanceId = RoleEnvironment.CurrentRoleInstance.Id;Di2015NewLine    var li1 = roleInstanceId.LastIndexOf(".");Di2015NewLine    var li2 = roleInstanceId.LastIndexOf("_");Di2015NewLine    var roleInstanceNo = roleInstanceId.Substring(Math.Max(li1, li2) + 1);Di2015NewLine    return Int32.Parse(roleInstanceNo);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13329085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> Search<T>(this IQueryable<T> source, List<Expression<Func<T, bool>>> predicates = null)Di2015NewLine            where T : EntityObjectDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (predicates == null || predicates.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                return source;Di2015NewLine            else if (predicates.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine                return source.Where(predicates[0]);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var query = PredicateBuilder.False<T>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var predicate in predicates)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    query = query.Or(predicate);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return source.AsExpandable().Where(query);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication4Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   class ProgramDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         string fileName = @"C:\\Temp\\a1.txt";Di2015NewLine         int arraySize = 512 * 1024 * 1024;Di2015NewLine         var bytes = new byte[arraySize];Di2015NewLine         new Random().NextBytes(bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // This prints false, as expected for async callDi2015NewLine         var callback = new AsyncCallback(result =>Di2015NewLine                             Console.WriteLine("Completed Synchronously: " + result.CompletedSynchronously));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         tryDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // Use this method to generate file...Di2015NewLine            //WriteFileWithRandomBytes(fileName, arraySize, bytes, callback);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ReadFileAsync invoked at " + DateTimeOffset.Now);Di2015NewLine            var task = ReadFileAsync(fileName);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ReadFileAsync completed at " + DateTimeOffset.Now);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task.WaitAll(task);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Wait on a read task completed at " + DateTimeOffset.Now);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         finallyDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            if (File.Exists(fileName))Di2015NewLine               File.Delete(fileName);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      private static void WriteFileWithRandomBytes(string fileName, int arraySize, byte[] bytes, AsyncCallback callback)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         using (var fileStream = new FileStream(fileName,Di2015NewLine            FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None, 128 * 1024, FileOptions.Asynchronous))Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("BeginWrite invoked at " + DateTimeOffset.Now);Di2015NewLine            var asyncResult = fileStream.BeginWrite(bytes, 0, arraySize, callback, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("BeginWrite completed at " + DateTimeOffset.Now);Di2015NewLine            // completes in 6 seconds or so...  Expecting instantaneous return instead of blockingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // I expect runtime to block here...Di2015NewLine            Task.WaitAll(Task.Factory.FromAsync(asyncResult, fileStream.EndWrite));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // or at least when flushing the stream on the following end-curlyDi2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      private static Task<int> ReadFileAsync(string filePath)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         FileInfo fi = new FileInfo(filePath);Di2015NewLine         byte[] buffer = new byte[fi.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         var file = new FileStream(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.None, 64 * 1024, FileOptions.Asynchronous);Di2015NewLine         Task<int> task = Task<int>.Factory.FromAsync(file.BeginRead, file.EndRead, buffer, 0, buffer.Length, null);Di2015NewLine         return task.ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            file.Close();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done ReadFileAsync, read " + t.Result + " bytes.");Di2015NewLine            return t.Result;Di2015NewLine         });Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13337704Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom

13337704Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Point> parkedCars = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLineRandom random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int parked = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 12000; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double x = random.NextDouble() * 100;Di2015NewLine        double y = random.NextDouble() * 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Point pointToPark = new Point(x, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsSafeToPark(pointToPark))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parkedCars.Add(pointToPark);Di2015NewLine            parked++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Parked: " + parked);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool IsSafeToPark(Point pointToPark)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //make sure it's "inside" the boxDi2015NewLine    if (pointToPark.X < 0.5 || pointToPark.X > 99.5Di2015NewLine        || pointToPark.Y < 0.5 || pointToPark.Y > 99.5)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (parkedCars.Any(p => Distance(pointToPark, p) <= 1))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate double Distance(Point p1, Point p2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Math.Sqrt((p1.X - p2.X) * (p1.X - p2.X) + (p1.Y - p2.Y) * (p1.Y - p2.Y));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13337704Di2015UniqueSeparatorDistance

13337704Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct PointDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double X,Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Point(double x, double y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.X = x;Di2015NewLine        this.Y = y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<Point> parkedCars = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLineRandom random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int parked = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 12000; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double x = random.NextDouble() * 100;Di2015NewLine        double y = random.NextDouble() * 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Point pointToPark = new Point(x, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsSafeToPark(pointToPark))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parkedCars.Add(pointToPark);Di2015NewLine            parked++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Parked: " + parked);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool IsSafeToPark(Point pointToPark)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (parkedCars.Any(p => Distance(pointToPark, p) <= 1))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate double Distance(Point p1, Point p2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Math.Max(Math.Abs(p1.X - p2.X), Math.Abs(p1.Y - p2.Y));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13354883Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IpcServerChannel IpcCreateServer<TRemoteObject>(Di2015NewLine        ref String RefChannelName,Di2015NewLine        WellKnownObjectMode InObjectMode,Di2015NewLine        TRemoteObject ipcInterface, String ipcUri, bool useNewMethod,Di2015NewLine        params WellKnownSidType[] InAllowedClientSIDs) where TRemoteObject : MarshalByRefObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String ChannelName = RefChannelName ?? GenerateName();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        // create security descriptor for IpcChannel...Di2015NewLine        System.Collections.IDictionary Properties = new System.Collections.Hashtable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Properties["name"] = ChannelName;Di2015NewLine        Properties["portName"] = ChannelName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DiscretionaryAcl DACL = new DiscretionaryAcl(false, false, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (InAllowedClientSIDs.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (RefChannelName != null)Di2015NewLine                throw new System.Security.HostProtectionException("If no random channel name is being used, you shall specify all allowed SIDs.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // allow access from all users... Channel is protected by random path name!Di2015NewLine            DACL.AddAccess(Di2015NewLine                AccessControlType.Allow,Di2015NewLine                new SecurityIdentifier(Di2015NewLine                    WellKnownSidType.WorldSid,Di2015NewLine                    null),Di2015NewLine                -1,Di2015NewLine                InheritanceFlags.None,Di2015NewLine                PropagationFlags.None);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < InAllowedClientSIDs.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DACL.AddAccess(Di2015NewLine                    AccessControlType.Allow,Di2015NewLine                    new SecurityIdentifier(Di2015NewLine                        InAllowedClientSIDs[i],Di2015NewLine                        null),Di2015NewLine                    -1,Di2015NewLine                    InheritanceFlags.None,Di2015NewLine                    PropagationFlags.None);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CommonSecurityDescriptor SecDescr = new CommonSecurityDescriptor(false, false,Di2015NewLine            ControlFlags.GroupDefaulted |Di2015NewLine            ControlFlags.OwnerDefaulted |Di2015NewLine            ControlFlags.DiscretionaryAclPresent,Di2015NewLine            null, null, null,Di2015NewLine            DACL);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        // create IpcChannel...Di2015NewLine        BinaryServerFormatterSinkProvider BinaryProv = new BinaryServerFormatterSinkProvider();Di2015NewLine        BinaryProv.TypeFilterLevel = TypeFilterLevel.Full;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IpcServerChannel Result = new IpcServerChannel(Properties, BinaryProv, SecDescr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!useNewMethod)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ChannelServices.RegisterChannel(Result, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RemotingConfiguration.RegisterWellKnownServiceType(Di2015NewLine                typeof(TRemoteObject),Di2015NewLine                ChannelName,Di2015NewLine                InObjectMode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ChannelServices.RegisterChannel(Result, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ObjRef refGreeter = RemotingServices.Marshal(ipcInterface, ipcUri);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RefChannelName = ChannelName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a globally reachable, managed IPC-Port.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// Because it is something tricky to get a port working for any constellation ofDi2015NewLine    /// target processes, I decided to write a proper wrapper method. Just keep the returnedDi2015NewLine    /// <see cref="IpcChannel"/> alive, by adding it to a global list or static variable,Di2015NewLine    /// as long as you want to have the IPC port open.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TRemoteObject">Di2015NewLine    /// A class derived from <see cref="MarshalByRefObject"/> which provides theDi2015NewLine    /// method implementations this server should expose.Di2015NewLine    /// </typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="InObjectMode">Di2015NewLine    /// <see cref="WellKnownObjectMode.SingleCall"/> if you want to handle each call in an newDi2015NewLine    /// object instance, <see cref="WellKnownObjectMode.Singleton"/> otherwise. The latter will implicitlyDi2015NewLine    /// allow you to use "static" remote variables.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="RefChannelName">Di2015NewLine    /// Either <c>null</c> to let the method generate a random channel name to be passed to Di2015NewLine    /// <see cref="IpcConnectClient{TRemoteObject}"/> or a predefined one. If you pass a value unequal to Di2015NewLine    /// <c>null</c>, you shall also specify all SIDs that are allowed to connect to your channel!Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="InAllowedClientSIDs">Di2015NewLine    /// If no SID is specified, all authenticated users will be allowed to access the serverDi2015NewLine    /// channel by default. You must specify an SID if <paramref name="RefChannelName"/> is unequal to <c>null</c>.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// An <see cref="IpcChannel"/> that shall be keept alive until the server is not needed anymore.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="System.Security.HostProtectionException">Di2015NewLine    /// If a predefined channel name is being used, you are required to specify a list of well known SIDsDi2015NewLine    /// which are allowed to access the newly created server.Di2015NewLine    /// </exception>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="RemotingException">Di2015NewLine    /// The given channel name is already in use.Di2015NewLine    /// </exception>Di2015NewLine    public static IpcServerChannel IpcCreateServer<TRemoteObject>(Di2015NewLine        ref String RefChannelName,Di2015NewLine        WellKnownObjectMode InObjectMode,Di2015NewLine        params WellKnownSidType[] InAllowedClientSIDs) where TRemoteObject : MarshalByRefObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return IpcCreateServer<TRemoteObject>(ref RefChannelName, InObjectMode, null, null, false, InAllowedClientSIDs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13359133Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing Excel = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel;Di2015NewLineusing Word = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets an Interop.Application object and its associated processIdDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Excel.Application or Word.Application depending on _isExcel</returns>Di2015NewLine    private object ApplicationFactory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object application = null;Di2015NewLine        string processName = (_isExcel) ? "excel" : "winword";Di2015NewLine        Process[] beforeProcesses = null;Di2015NewLine        Process[] afterProcesses = null;Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (i < 3)Di2015NewLine        { // ourProcess = afterList - beforeListDi2015NewLine            beforeProcesses = Process.GetProcessesByName(processName);Di2015NewLine            application = (_isExcel) ? (object)new Excel.Application() : (object)new Word.Application();Di2015NewLine            afterProcesses = Process.GetProcessesByName(processName);Di2015NewLine            if ((afterProcesses.Length - beforeProcesses.Length) == 1)Di2015NewLine            { // OK. Just a single new processDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            { // Two or more processes, we cannot get our processIdDi2015NewLine                // therefore quit while we can and try againDi2015NewLine                if (_isExcel)Di2015NewLine                    ((Excel._Application)application).Quit();Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    ((Word._Application)application).Quit();Di2015NewLine                int indexReferences = 1;Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    indexReferences = System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReleaseComObject(application);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (indexReferences > 0);Di2015NewLine                application = null;Di2015NewLine                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(150);Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (application == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Unable to create Excel Application and get its processId");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        List<int> processIdList = new List<int>(afterProcesses.Length);Di2015NewLine        foreach (Process procDesp in afterProcesses)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            processIdList.Add(procDesp.Id);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (Process proc in beforeProcesses)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            processIdList.Remove(proc.Id);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _processId = processIdList[0];Di2015NewLine        return application;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Kills _processId process if existsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void ProcessKill()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Process applicationProcess = null;Di2015NewLine        if (_processId != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                applicationProcess = Process.GetProcessById(_processId);Di2015NewLine                applicationProcess.Kill();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            { // no Process with that processIdDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13359133Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace OfficeUtils.StackDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Stack of COM objects to be releasedDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class ComObjectsStackDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stack<object> comObjects = new Stack<object>();Di2015NewLine    private int mark = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Releases all the remaining COM objectsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    ~ComObjectsStack()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (comObjects.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            ReleaseAll();Di2015NewLine        comObjects = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Add a new object to the stack to be releasedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="obj">Nuevo objeto a liberar</param>Di2015NewLine    public void Push(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        comObjects.Push(obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Release the last object in the stackDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Pop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Release(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Mark for future use of ReleaseUpToMarkDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Mark()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mark = comObjects.Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Release up to markDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Number of released objects</returns>Di2015NewLine    public int ReleaseUpToMark()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int numberObjects = comObjects.Count - mark;Di2015NewLine        if (numberObjects > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Release(numberObjects);Di2015NewLine            return numberObjects;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Release all the objects in the stackDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void ReleaseAll()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (comObjects != null)Di2015NewLine            Release(comObjects.Count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Release the last numberObjects objects in stackDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="numberObjects">Number of objects to release</param>Di2015NewLine    private void Release(int numberObjects)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < numberObjects; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object obj = comObjects.Pop();Di2015NewLine            int i = 1;Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                i = System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReleaseComObject(obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (i > 0);Di2015NewLine            obj = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13359693Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool isConsecutive = !myIntList.Select((i,j) => i-j).Distinct().Skip(1).Any();Di2015NewLine
13359693Di2015UniqueSeparatorInput is { 5, 6, 7, 8 }Di2015NewLineSelect yields { (5-0=)5, (6-1=)5, (7-2=)5, (8-3=)5 }Di2015NewLineDistinct yields { 5, (5 not distinct, 5 not distinct, 5 not distinct) }Di2015NewLineSkip yields { (5 skipped, nothing left) }Di2015NewLineAny returns falseDi2015NewLine

13359812Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringLengthWarning
13359812Di2015UniqueSeparatorIsValid(value, validationContext
13359812Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Property | AttributeTargets.Field, AllowMultiple = false, Inherited = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic class StringLengthWarningAttribute : ValidationAttribute, IClientValidatable Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int MaximumLength { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool IsValid(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ValidationResult IsValid(object value, ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var model = validationContext.ObjectInstance as BaseViewModel;Di2015NewLine        var str = value as string;Di2015NewLine        if (!model.IgnoreWarnings && (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(str) || str.Length > MaximumLength))Di2015NewLine            return new ValidationResult(ErrorMessage);Di2015NewLine        return base.IsValid(value, validationContext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<ModelClientValidationRule> GetClientValidationRules(ModelMetadata metadata, ControllerContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return new StringLengthWarningValidationRule(MaximumLength, ErrorMessage);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13364475Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Random(int Seed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int num = (Seed == -2147483648) ? 2147483647 : Math.Abs(Seed);Di2015NewLine    int num2 = 161803398 - num;Di2015NewLine    this.SeedArray[55] = num2;Di2015NewLine    int num3 = 1;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < 55; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int num4 = 21 * i % 55;Di2015NewLine        this.SeedArray[num4] = num3;Di2015NewLine        num3 = num2 - num3;Di2015NewLine        if (num3 < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            num3 += 2147483647;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        num2 = this.SeedArray[num4];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 1; j < 5; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int k = 1; k < 56; k++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.SeedArray[k] -= this.SeedArray[1 + (k + 30) % 55];Di2015NewLine            if (this.SeedArray[k] < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.SeedArray[k] += 2147483647;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    this.inext = 0;Di2015NewLine    this.inextp = 21;Di2015NewLine    Seed = 1;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

13369371Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Image GetIcon(string fileName, int size)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IShellItem shellItem;Di2015NewLine        Shell32.SHCreateItemFromParsingName(fileName, IntPtr.Zero, Shell32.IShellItem_GUID, out shellItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr hbitmap;Di2015NewLine        ((IShellItemImageFactory)shellItem).GetImage(new SIZE(size, size), 0x0, out hbitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get the info about the HBITMAP inside the IPictureDispDi2015NewLine        DIBSECTION dibsection = new DIBSECTION();Di2015NewLine        Gdi32.GetObjectDIBSection(hbitmap, Marshal.SizeOf(dibsection), ref dibsection);Di2015NewLine        int width = dibsection.dsBm.bmWidth;Di2015NewLine        int height = dibsection.dsBm.bmHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create the destination Bitmap objectDi2015NewLine        Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < dibsection.dsBmih.biWidth; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < dibsection.dsBmih.biHeight; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int i = y * dibsection.dsBmih.biWidth + x;Di2015NewLine                IntPtr ptr = dibsection.dsBm.bmBits + (i * Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(RGBQUAD)));Di2015NewLine                var rgbquad = (RGBQUAD)Marshal.PtrToStructure(ptr, typeof(RGBQUAD));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (rgbquad.rgbReserved != 0)Di2015NewLine                    bitmap.SetPixel(x, y, Color.FromArgb(rgbquad.rgbReserved, rgbquad.rgbRed, rgbquad.rgbGreen, rgbquad.rgbBlue));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Gdi32.DeleteObject(hbitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return bitmap;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13371213Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static StreamWriter stdout = new StreamWriter(Console.OpenStandardOutput());Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action<string>[] tests = new Action<string>[] { Test1, Test2, Test3 };Di2015NewLine        TimeSpan[] timming = new TimeSpan[tests.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Repeat the entire sequence of tests many times to accumulate the resultDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for( int itest =0; itest < tests.Length; itest++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string text = String.Format("just a little test string, test = {0}, iteration = {1}", itest, i);Di2015NewLine                Action<string> thisTest = tests[itest];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Clear the console so that each test begins from the same stateDi2015NewLine                Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine                var timer = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine                //Repeat the test many times, if this was not using the console Di2015NewLine                //I would use a much higher number, say 10,000Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < 100; j++)Di2015NewLine                    thisTest(text);Di2015NewLine                timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine                //Accumulate the result, but ignore the first runDi2015NewLine                if (i != 0)Di2015NewLine                    timming[itest] += timer.Elapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Depending on what you are benchmarking you may need to force GC hereDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now print the results we have collectedDi2015NewLine        Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine        for (int itest = 0; itest < tests.Length; itest++)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Test {0} = {1}", itest + 1, timming[itest]);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Test1(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Test2(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var c in str)Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(c);Di2015NewLine        Console.Write('\\n');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Test3(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var c in str)Di2015NewLine            stdout.Write(c);Di2015NewLine        stdout.Write('\\n');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13373288Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Function SQLParameterType(ByVal ParameterDataType As String) As StringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ParameterDataType = ParameterDataType.ToUpperDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    If ParameterDataType.IndexOf("NVARCHAR") > 0 ThenDi2015NewLine        Return "string"Di2015NewLine    ElseIf ParameterDataType.IndexOf("VARCHAR") > 0 ThenDi2015NewLine        Return "string"Di2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Select Case ParameterDataTypeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Case Is = "BIGINT"Di2015NewLine            Return "Int64"Di2015NewLine        Case Is = "INT"Di2015NewLine            Return "Int32"Di2015NewLine        Case Is = "SMALLINT"Di2015NewLine            Return "Int16"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Case Is = "BIT"Di2015NewLine            If gIsVBdotNet ThenDi2015NewLine                Return "boolean"Di2015NewLine            ElseDi2015NewLine                Return "bool"Di2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Case Is = "DATETIME"Di2015NewLine            Return "DateTime"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Case Is = "DATETIME2"Di2015NewLine            Return "DateTime"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Case Is = "SMALLDATETIME"Di2015NewLine            Return "DateTime"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Case Is = "MONEY"Di2015NewLine            Return "single" 'floatDi2015NewLine        Case Is = "FLOAT"Di2015NewLine            Return "single" 'floatDi2015NewLine        Case Is = "REAL"Di2015NewLine            Return "double"Di2015NewLine            'Case Is = "INT"Di2015NewLine            '    Return "int32"Di2015NewLine            'Case Is = "INT"Di2015NewLine            '    Return "int32"Di2015NewLine        Case ElseDi2015NewLine            Return "666"Di2015NewLine    End SelectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

13373992Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AutoMockingContainerExtension : UnityContainerExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override void Initialize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var strategy = new AutoMockingBuilderStrategy(Container);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Context.Strategies.Add(strategy, UnityBuildStage.PreCreation);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class AutoMockingBuilderStrategy : BuilderStrategyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly IUnityContainer container;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Dictionary<Type, object> substitutes Di2015NewLine           = new Dictionary<Type, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AutoMockingBuilderStrategy(IUnityContainer container)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.container = container;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void PreBuildUp(IBuilderContext context)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var key = context.OriginalBuildKey;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (key.Type.IsInterface && !container.IsRegistered(key.Type))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                context.Existing = GetOrCreateSubstitute(key.Type);Di2015NewLine                context.BuildComplete = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private object GetOrCreateSubstitute(Type type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (substitutes.ContainsKey(type))Di2015NewLine                return substitutes[type];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var substitute = Substitute.For(new[] {type}, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            substitutes.Add(type, substitute);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return substitute;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13374721Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void ReflectMethods(Control control, Control baseControl, string[] excludedEventNames = null, string[] includedEventNames = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type baseType = baseControl.GetType();Di2015NewLine        Type ownType = control.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EventHandlerList events = typeof(Control).GetProperty("Events", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic).GetValue(baseControl, null) as EventHandlerList;Di2015NewLine        foreach (EventInfo baseEventInfo in baseType.GetEvents())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (excludedEventNames != null && excludedEventNames.Contains(baseEventInfo.Name))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (includedEventNames != null && !includedEventNames.Contains(baseEventInfo.Name))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // Checking if current control has the same event..Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            foreach (EventInfo ownEventInfo in ownType.GetEvents())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (ownEventInfo.Name == baseEventInfo.Name)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object eventField = typeof(Control).GetField("Event" + baseEventInfo.Name, BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Static).GetValue(baseControl);Di2015NewLine                    Delegate aDel = events[eventField];Di2015NewLine                    ownEventInfo.AddEventHandler(control, aDel);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

displayControlDetails(WordprocessingDocument doc, StringValue controlId)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string classId, type, value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            OpenXmlPart part = doc.MainDocumentPart.GetPartById(controlId);Di2015NewLine            OpenXmlReader reader = OpenXmlReader.Create(part.GetStream());Di2015NewLine            reader.Read();Di2015NewLine "TextBox";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case radioButtonId:Di2015NewLine                    type = "Radio Button";Di2015NewLine           type = "Not known";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            value = "No value attribute"; //displays this if there is no "value" attribute foundDi2015NewLine            foreach (OpenXmlElement child in controlDetails.Elements())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (child.GetAttribute("name", controlDetails.NamespaceUri).Value == "Value")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //we've found the value typed by the user in this controlDi2015NewLine                    value = child.GetAttribute("value", controlDetails.NamespaceUri).Value;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Class id: {0}", classId);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Control type: {0}", type);Di2015NewLine 13379152Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<T> GetAllPagingAndSorting(out int totalRecords, int pageSize, int pageIndex, string orderingKey, string sortDir, params Expression<Func<T, object>>[] includes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                IQueryable<T> results = Entities;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                totalRecords = results.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // apply any includesDi2015NewLine                if (includes != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    results = includes.Aggregate(results, (current, include) => current.Include(include));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // apply sorting    Di2015NewLine                results = GetSortDirection(sortDir) == SortDirection.Ascending ? ApplyOrder(results, orderingKey, ORDERBY) : ApplyOrder(results, orderingKey, ORDERBYDESC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (pageSize > 0 && pageIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // apply pagingDi2015NewLine                    results = results.Skip(pageIndex * pageSize).Take(pageSize);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return results.ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine protected static IOrderedQueryable<T> ApplyOrder(IQueryable<T> source, string property, string methodName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] props = property.Split('.');Di2015NewLine            Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression arg = Expression.Parameter(type, "m");Di2015NewLine            Expression expr = arg;Di2015NewLine            foreach (string prop in props)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // use reflection (not ComponentModel) to mirror LINQDi2015NewLine                PropertyInfo pi = type.GetProperty(prop);Di2015NewLine                expr = Expression.Property(expr, pi);Di2015NewLine                type = pi.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Type delegateType = typeof(Func<,>).MakeGenericType(typeof(T), type);Di2015NewLine            LambdaExpression lambda = Expression.Lambda(delegateType, expr, arg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            object result = typeof(Queryable).GetMethods().Single(Di2015NewLine                    method => method.Name == methodNameDi2015NewLine                            && method.IsGenericMethodDefinitionDi2015NewLine                            && method.GetGenericArguments().Length == 2Di2015NewLine                            && method.GetParameters().Length == 2)Di2015NewLine                    .MakeGenericMethod(typeof(T), type)Di2015NewLine                    .Invoke(null, new object[] { source, lambda });Di2015NewLine            return (IOrderedQueryable<T>)result;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine

13379159Di2015UniqueSeparator   internal static class ProviderFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IHaveDbProvider GetProviderByName(string providerName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (providerName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case SqlServerProvider.ProviderName:return new SqlServerProvider();Di2015NewLine            case MySqlProvider.ProviderName:return new MySqlProvider();Di2015NewLine            case PostgresProvider.ProviderName:return new PostgresProvider();Di2015NewLine            case OracleProvider.ProviderName:return new OracleProvider();Di2015NewLine            case SqlServerCEProvider.ProviderName:return new SqlServerCEProvider();Di2015NewLine            case SqliteProvider.ProviderName:return new SqliteProvider();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Unkown provider");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IHaveDbProvider GetProvider(DBType type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case DBType.SqlServer: return new SqlServerProvider();Di2015NewLine            case DBType.SqlServerCE: return new SqlServerCEProvider();Di2015NewLine            case DBType.MySql: return new MySqlProvider();Di2015NewLine            case DBType.PostgreSQL:return new PostgresProvider();Di2015NewLine            case DBType.Oracle:return new OracleProvider();Di2015NewLine            case DBType.SQLite:return new SqliteProvider();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Unkown provider");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13383916Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<TSource>> Batch<TSource>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine    int batchSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var batch = new List<TSource>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        batch.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        if (batch.Count == batchSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             yield return batch;Di2015NewLine             batch = new List<TSource>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (batch.Any()) yield return batch;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13384418Di2015UniqueSeparator<cfscript>Di2015NewLine    savecontent variable="signatureString" {Di2015NewLine        WriteOutput("GET#chr(10)##chr(10)##chr(10)##chr(10)#x-ms-date:Mon, 01 Dec 2008 05:17:57 GMT#chr(10)#/accountname/queuename/messages");Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    key = binaryDecode("abcd", "base64");Di2015NewLine    resultInHex = hmac(signatureString, key,"HMACSHA256");Di2015NewLine    // result: wxR7Bt6sWEKVJ9vEjCiuqA8OKCZOKYfbxaXj85whOkM=Di2015NewLine    WriteDump(binaryEncode(binaryDecode(resultInHex, "hex"), "base64"));Di2015NewLine</cfscript>Di2015NewLine
