13384811Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DictionaryComparer<TKey, TValue> Di2015NewLine    : IEqualityComparer<Dictionary<TKey, TValue>>Di2015NewLine
13384889Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var values = new List<string>Di2015NewLine    {"1 Some Street, Some Town, XYZ" ,Di2015NewLine    "2 Some Street, Some Town, ABC" ,Di2015NewLine    "3 Some Street, Some Town, XYZ" ,Di2015NewLine    "4 Some Street, Some Town, ABC" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(LongestCommonSubstring(values));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string LongestCommonSubstring(IList<string> values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string result = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < values.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = i + 1; j < values.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string tmp;Di2015NewLine            if (LongestCommonSubstring(values[i], values[j], out tmp) > result.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = tmp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Source: http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Algorithm_Implementation/Strings/Longest_common_substringDi2015NewLinepublic static int LongestCommonSubstring(string str1, string str2, out string sequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sequence = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(str1) || String.IsNullOrEmpty(str2))Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[,] num = new int[str1.Length, str2.Length];Di2015NewLine    int maxlen = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lastSubsBegin = 0;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sequenceBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < str1.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < str2.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (str1[i] != str2[j])Di2015NewLine                num[i, j] = 0;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((i == 0) || (j == 0))Di2015NewLine                    num[i, j] = 1;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    num[i, j] = 1 + num[i - 1, j - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (num[i, j] > maxlen)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    maxlen = num[i, j];Di2015NewLine                    int thisSubsBegin = i - num[i, j] + 1;Di2015NewLine                    if (lastSubsBegin == thisSubsBegin)Di2015NewLine                    {//if the current LCS is the same as the last time this block ranDi2015NewLine                        sequenceBuilder.Append(str1[i]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else //this block resets the string builder if a different LCS is foundDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        lastSubsBegin = thisSubsBegin;Di2015NewLine                        sequenceBuilder.Length = 0; //clear itDi2015NewLine                        sequenceBuilder.Append(str1.Substring(lastSubsBegin, (i + 1) - lastSubsBegin));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sequence = sequenceBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    return maxlen;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13386067Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// DataGridView cell class for check box cells with a OnContentClick event handler.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell : DataGridViewCheckBoxCellDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Event handler for OnContentClick event.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected EventHandler<DataGridViewCellEventArgs> ContentClickEventHandler { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Empty constructor. Required. Used by Clone mechanismDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell()Di2015NewLine        : base()Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Pass through constructor for threeState parameter.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="threeState">True for three state check boxes, True, False, Indeterminate.</param>Di2015NewLine    public DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell(bool threeState)Di2015NewLine        : base(threeState)Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Constructor to set the OnContentClick event handler.  Di2015NewLine    /// Signature for handler should be (object sender, DataGridViewCellEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    /// The sender will be the DataGridViewCell that is clicked.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="handler">Handler for OnContentClick event</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="threeState">True for three state check boxes, True, False, Indeterminate.</param>Di2015NewLine    public DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell(EventHandler<DataGridViewCellEventArgs> handler, bool threeState)Di2015NewLine        : base(threeState)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ContentClickEventHandler = handler;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Clone method override.  Required so CheckEventHandler property is cloned.Di2015NewLine    /// Individual DataGridViewCells are cloned from the DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplateDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public override object Clone()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell clone = (DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell)base.Clone();Di2015NewLine        clone.ContentClickEventHandler = ContentClickEventHandler;Di2015NewLine        return clone;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Override implementing OnContentClick event propagation Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">Event arg object, which contains row and column indexes.</param>Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnContentClick(DataGridViewCellEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnContentClick(e);Di2015NewLine        if (ContentClickEventHandler != null)Di2015NewLine            ContentClickEventHandler(this, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Override implementing OnContentDoubleClick event propagation Di2015NewLine    /// Required so fast clicks are handled properly.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">Event arg object, which contains row and column indexes.</param>Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnContentDoubleClick(DataGridViewCellEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnContentDoubleClick(e);Di2015NewLine        if (ContentClickEventHandler != null)Di2015NewLine            ContentClickEventHandler(this, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13386067Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void OnHoldCheckClick(object sender, DataGridViewCellEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sender is DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell cell = sender as DataGridViewEventCheckBoxCell;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!cell.ReadOnly)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // The rows in the DataGridView are bound to Specimen objectsDi2015NewLine                Specimen specimen = (Specimen)cell.OwningRow.DataBoundItem;Di2015NewLine                // Modify the underlying data sourceDi2015NewLine                if ((bool)cell.EditedFormattedValue)Di2015NewLine                    specimen.IsReleased = false;Di2015NewLine                else if (specimen.WasReleased)Di2015NewLine                    specimen.IsReleased = true;Di2015NewLine                // Then invalidate the cell in the other column to force it to redrawDi2015NewLine                DataGridViewCell releasedCell = cell.OwningRow.Cells["IsReleased"];Di2015NewLine                cell.DataGridView.InvalidateCell(releasedCell);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13386441Di2015UniqueSeparator// The mechanism for waking up the second thread once data is availableDi2015NewLineAutoResetEvent _dataAvailable = new AutoResetEvent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The mechanism for making sure that the data object is not overwritten while it is being read.Di2015NewLineReaderWriterLockSlim _readWriteLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The object that contains the data (note that you might use a collection or something similar but anything worksDi2015NewLineobject _data = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid FirstThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do something to calculate the data, but do not store it in _dataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a lock so that the _data field can be safely updated.Di2015NewLine        _readWriteLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // assign the data (add into the collection etc.)Di2015NewLine            _data = ...;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // notify the other thread that data is availableDi2015NewLine            _dataAvailable.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // release the lock on dataDi2015NewLine            _readWriteLock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid SecondThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object local; // this will hold the data received from the other threadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // wait for the other thread to provide dataDi2015NewLine        _dataAvailable.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a lock so that the _data field can be safely readDi2015NewLine        _readWriteLock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // read the data (add into the collection etc.)Di2015NewLine            local = _data.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // release the lock on dataDi2015NewLine            _readWriteLock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now do something with the dataDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13386573Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid WriteFile(HttpListenerContext ctx)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var response = ctx.Response;Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream fs = File.OpenRead(@"..."))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //response is HttpListenerContext.Response...Di2015NewLine        response.ContentLength64 = fs.Length;Di2015NewLine        response.SendChunked = false;Di2015NewLine        response.ContentType = System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Application.Octet;Di2015NewLine        response.AddHeader("Content-disposition", "attachment; filename=largefile.zip");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[64 * 1024];Di2015NewLine        int read;Di2015NewLine        using (BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(response.OutputStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while ((read = fs.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bw.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine                bw.Flush(); //seems to have no effectDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bw.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        response.StatusCode = (int)HttpStatusCode.OK;Di2015NewLine        response.StatusDescription = "OK";Di2015NewLine        response.OutputStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13388342Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool CheckParentheses(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var ch in input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ch == '(') count++;Di2015NewLine        if (ch == ')') count--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if a parenthesis is closed without being opened return falseDi2015NewLine        if(count < 0)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // in the end the test is passed only if count is zeroDi2015NewLine    return count == 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13396787Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable getDataTableFromExcel(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var pck = new OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var stream = File.OpenRead(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pck.Load(stream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var ws = pck.Workbook.Worksheets.First();  Di2015NewLine        DataTable tbl = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        bool hasHeader = true; // adjust it accordingly( i've mentioned that this is a simple approach)Di2015NewLine        foreach (var firstRowCell in ws.Cells[1, 1, 1, ws.Dimension.End.Column])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tbl.Columns.Add(hasHeader ? firstRowCell.Text : string.Format("Column {0}", firstRowCell.Start.Column));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var startRow = hasHeader ? 2 : 1;Di2015NewLine        for (var rowNum = startRow; rowNum <= ws.Dimension.End.Row; rowNum++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var wsRow = ws.Cells[rowNum, 1, rowNum, ws.Dimension.End.Column];Di2015NewLine            var row = tbl.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var cell in wsRow)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                row[cell.Start.Column - 1] = cell.Text;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            tbl.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return tbl;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13401537Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Checks if application window open.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static bool IfApplicationWindowOpen(string windowName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> collection = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        user32.EnumDelegate filter = delegate(IntPtr hWnd, int lParam)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder strbTitle = new StringBuilder(255);Di2015NewLine            int nLength = user32.GetWindowText(hWnd, strbTitle, strbTitle.Capacity + 1);Di2015NewLine            string strTitle = strbTitle.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (user32.IsWindowVisible(hWnd) && string.IsNullOrEmpty(strTitle) == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                collection.Add(strTitle);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (user32.EnumDesktopWindows(IntPtr.Zero, filter, IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string item in collection)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (item.ToString().Equals(windowName))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
13401537Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Starts the new customer.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="param">The param.</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void StartNewCustomer(Parameter param)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string windowName = "New Customer";Di2015NewLine        if (!IfApplicationWindowOpen(windowName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            GlobalFactory globalfactory = param.GlobalFactory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Generic objNewCustomer = new Generic();Di2015NewLine                objNewCustomer.StartNewCustomerFromCustomer(param);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (TypeInitializationException tx)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                globalfactory.ErrorHandler.Log(tx, (int)msmsError.ErrorSeverity.Major | (int)msmsError.ErrorSeverity.User);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                globalfactory.ErrorHandler.Log(ex, (int)msmsError.ErrorSeverity.Major | (int)msmsError.ErrorSeverity.User);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("The application " + windowName + " is already open", windowName + ": Launch Error", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Error);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13404970Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction encrypt_pkcs7($str, $key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    $key = md5(utf8_encode($key), true);Di2015NewLine    $block = mcrypt_get_block_size(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, MCRYPT_MODE_ECB);Di2015NewLine    $pad = $block - (strlen($str) % $block);Di2015NewLine    $str .= str_repeat(chr($pad), $pad);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $ciphertext = mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $key, $str, MCRYPT_MODE_ECB);Di2015NewLine    return base64_encode($ciphertext);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineecho encrypt_pkcs7('test', '123456');Di2015NewLine

13404970Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction encrypt_pkcs7($str, $key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // derive 192-bit key using SHA-256Di2015NewLine    $key = substr(hash('sha256', $key, true), 0, 24);Di2015NewLine    $block = mcrypt_get_block_size(MCRYPT_3DES, MCRYPT_MODE_ECB);Di2015NewLine    $pad = $block - (strlen($str) % $block);Di2015NewLine    $str .= str_repeat(chr($pad), $pad);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $ciphertext = mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_3DES, $key, $str, MCRYPT_MODE_ECB);Di2015NewLine    return base64_encode($ciphertext);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineecho encrypt_pkcs7('test', '123456');Di2015NewLine

13405948Di2015UniqueSeparatorSendAsync
13405948Di2015UniqueSeparator    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    public static string[] addresses = {"microsoft.com", "yahoo.com", "google.com"};Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Task<PingReply>> pingTasks = new List<Task<PingReply>>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var address in addresses)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pingTasks.Add(PingAsync(address));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Wait for all the tasks to completeDi2015NewLine        Task.WaitAll(pingTasks.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now you can iterate over your list of pingTasksDi2015NewLine        foreach (var pingTask in pingTasks)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //pingTask.Result is whatever type T was declared in PingAsyncDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(pingTask.Result.RoundtripTime);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Task<PingReply> PingAsync(string address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<PingReply>();Di2015NewLine        Ping ping = new Ping();Di2015NewLine        ping.PingCompleted += (obj, sender) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcs.SetResult(sender.Reply);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        ping.SendAsync(address, new object());Di2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13414264Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Forename {get;set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Test<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Do(object target, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var obj = Expression.Constant(target, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        var member = Expression.PropertyOrField(obj, "Forename");Di2015NewLine        var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        Type type;Di2015NewLine        switch(member.Member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine                type = ((FieldInfo)member.Member).FieldType; break;Di2015NewLine            case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                type = ((PropertyInfo)member.Member).PropertyType; break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException(member.Member.MemberType.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var body = Expression.Assign(member, Expression.Convert(param, type));Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Action<object>>(body, param);Di2015NewLine        lambda.Compile()(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var obj = new Foo();Di2015NewLine        new Test<Foo>().Do(obj, "abc");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(obj.Forename);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorQueuedTaskScheduler

13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorQueuedTaskScheduler
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic QueuedTaskScheduler(Di2015NewLine        TaskScheduler targetScheduler,Di2015NewLine        int maxConcurrencyLevel,Di2015NewLine        bool awaitWrappedTasks = false)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine    _awaitWrappedTasks = awaitWrappedTasks;Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic QueuedTaskScheduler(Di2015NewLine        int threadCount,Di2015NewLine        string threadName = "",Di2015NewLine        bool useForegroundThreads = false,Di2015NewLine        ThreadPriority threadPriority = ThreadPriority.Normal,Di2015NewLine        ApartmentState threadApartmentState = ApartmentState.MTA,Di2015NewLine        int threadMaxStackSize = 0,Di2015NewLine        Action threadInit = null,Di2015NewLine        Action threadFinally = null,Di2015NewLine        bool awaitWrappedTasks = false)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine    _awaitWrappedTasks = awaitWrappedTasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // code starting threads (removed here in example)Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorProcessPrioritizedAndBatchedTasks()
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorasync
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async void ProcessPrioritizedAndBatchedTasks()Di2015NewLine
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async void ProcessPrioritizedAndBatchedTasks()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool continueProcessing = true;Di2015NewLine    while (!_disposeCancellation.IsCancellationRequested && continueProcessing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Note that we're processing tasks on this threadDi2015NewLine            _taskProcessingThread.Value = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Until there are no more tasks to processDi2015NewLine            while (!_disposeCancellation.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Try to get the next task.  If there aren't any more, we're done.Di2015NewLine                Task targetTask;Di2015NewLine                lock (_nonthreadsafeTaskQueue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_nonthreadsafeTaskQueue.Count == 0) break;Di2015NewLine                    targetTask = _nonthreadsafeTaskQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If the task is null, it's a placeholder for a task in the round-robin queues.Di2015NewLine                // Find the next one that should be processed.Di2015NewLine                QueuedTaskSchedulerQueue queueForTargetTask = null;Di2015NewLine                if (targetTask == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lock (_queueGroups) FindNextTask_NeedsLock(out targetTask, out queueForTargetTask);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Now if we finally have a task, run it.  If the taskDi2015NewLine                // was associated with one of the round-robin schedulers, we need to use itDi2015NewLine                // as a thunk to execute its task.Di2015NewLine                if (targetTask != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (queueForTargetTask != null) queueForTargetTask.ExecuteTask(targetTask);Di2015NewLine                    else TryExecuteTask(targetTask);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // ***** MODIFIED CODE START ****Di2015NewLine                    if (_awaitWrappedTasks)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var targetTaskType = targetTask.GetType();Di2015NewLine                        if (targetTaskType.IsConstructedGenericType && typeof(Task).IsAssignableFrom(targetTaskType.GetGenericArguments()[0]))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            dynamic targetTaskDynamic = targetTask;Di2015NewLine                            // Here we await the completion of the proxy task.Di2015NewLine                            // We do not await the proxy task directly, because that would result in that await will throw the exception of the wrapped task (if one existed)Di2015NewLine                            // In the continuation we then simply return the value of the exception object so that the exception (stored in the proxy task) does not go totally unobserved (that could cause the process to crash)Di2015NewLine                            await TaskExtensions.Unwrap(targetTaskDynamic).ContinueWith((Func<Task, Exception>)(t => t.Exception), TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    // ***** MODIFIED CODE END ****Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Now that we think we're done, verify that there really isDi2015NewLine            // no more work to do.  If there's not, highlightDi2015NewLine            // that we're now less parallel than we were a moment ago.Di2015NewLine            lock (_nonthreadsafeTaskQueue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_nonthreadsafeTaskQueue.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _delegatesQueuedOrRunning--;Di2015NewLine                    continueProcessing = false;Di2015NewLine                    _taskProcessingThread.Value = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorThreadBasedDispatchLoop
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorasync
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorThreadBasedDispatchLoop
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ThreadBasedDispatchLoop(Action threadInit, Action threadFinally)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _taskProcessingThread.Value = true;Di2015NewLine    if (threadInit != null) threadInit();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the scheduler is disposed, the cancellation token will be set andDi2015NewLine        // we'll receive an OperationCanceledException.  That OCE should not crash the process.Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If a thread abort occurs, we'll try to reset it and continue running.Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // For each task queued to the scheduler, try to execute it.Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var task in _blockingTaskQueue.GetConsumingEnumerable(_disposeCancellation.Token))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Task targetTask = task;Di2015NewLine                        // If the task is not null, that means it was queued to this scheduler directly.Di2015NewLine                        // Run it.Di2015NewLine                        if (targetTask != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            TryExecuteTask(targetTask);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        // If the task is null, that means it's just a placeholder for a taskDi2015NewLine                        // queued to one of the subschedulers.  Find the next task based onDi2015NewLine                        // priority and fairness and run it.Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Find the next task based on our ordering rules...                                    Di2015NewLine                            QueuedTaskSchedulerQueue queueForTargetTask;Di2015NewLine                            lock (_queueGroups) FindNextTask_NeedsLock(out targetTask, out queueForTargetTask);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // ... and if we found one, run itDi2015NewLine                            if (targetTask != null) queueForTargetTask.ExecuteTask(targetTask);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (_awaitWrappedTasks)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            var targetTaskType = targetTask.GetType();Di2015NewLine                            if (targetTaskType.IsConstructedGenericType && typeof(Task).IsAssignableFrom(targetTaskType.GetGenericArguments()[0]))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                dynamic targetTaskDynamic = targetTask;Di2015NewLine                                // Here we wait for the completion of the proxy task.Di2015NewLine                                // We do not wait for the proxy task directly, because that would result in that Wait() will throw the exception of the wrapped task (if one existed)Di2015NewLine                                // In the continuation we then simply return the value of the exception object so that the exception (stored in the proxy task) does not go totally unobserved (that could cause the process to crash)Di2015NewLine                                TaskExtensions.Unwrap(targetTaskDynamic).ContinueWith((Func<Task, Exception>)(t => t.Exception), TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously).Wait();Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (ThreadAbortException)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If we received a thread abort, and that thread abort was due to shutting downDi2015NewLine                    // or unloading, let it pass through.  Otherwise, reset the abort so we canDi2015NewLine                    // continue processing work items.Di2015NewLine                    if (!Environment.HasShutdownStarted && !AppDomain.CurrentDomain.IsFinalizingForUnload())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Thread.ResetAbort();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (OperationCanceledException) { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Run a cleanup routine if there was oneDi2015NewLine        if (threadFinally != null) threadFinally();Di2015NewLine        _taskProcessingThread.Value = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorLimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler
13414364Di2015UniqueSeparatorOrderedTaskScheduler

13416281Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic HtmlTable BuildTable<T>(List<T> Data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  HtmlTable ht = new HtmlTable();Di2015NewLine  //Get the columnsDi2015NewLine  HtmlTableRow htColumnsRow = new HtmlTableRow();Di2015NewLine  typeof(T).GetProperties().Select(prop =>Di2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                          HtmlTableCell htCell = new HtmlTableCell();Di2015NewLine                                          htCell.InnerText = prop.Name;Di2015NewLine                                          return htCell;Di2015NewLine                                        }).ToList().ForEach(cell => htColumnsRow.Cells.Add(cell));Di2015NewLine  ht.Rows.Add(htColumnsRow);Di2015NewLine  //Get the remaining rowsDi2015NewLine  Data.ForEach(delegate(T obj)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    HtmlTableRow htRow = new HtmlTableRow();Di2015NewLine    obj.GetType().GetProperties().ToList().ForEach(delegate(PropertyInfo prop)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      HtmlTableCell htCell = new HtmlTableCell();Di2015NewLine      htCell.InnerText = prop.GetValue(obj, null).ToString();Di2015NewLine      htRow.Cells.Add(htCell);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    ht.Rows.Add(htRow);Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLine  return ht;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13417375Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static DateTime AddWorkingDays(this DateTime date, int days)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (days == 0)Di2015NewLine            return date;Di2015NewLine        int sign = days < 0 ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine        while (days % 5 != 0 || !date.IsWorkingDay())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            date = date.AddDays(sign);Di2015NewLine            if (!date.IsWorkingDay())Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            days -= sign;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int nWeekEnds = days / 5;Di2015NewLine        DateTime result = date.AddDays(days + nWeekEnds * 2);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsWorkingDay(this DateTime date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !(date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday || date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

   if (genericType == typeof(IEnumerable<>))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            invocation.Proceed();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var method = GetType()Di2015NewLine                .GetMethod("HandleIteratorInvocation")Di2015NewLine                .MakeGenericMethod(Di2015NewLine                    invocation.Method.ReturnType.GetGenericArguments()[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            invocation.ReturnValue = method.Invoke(Di2015NewLine                null,Di2015NewLine                new[] { invocation.InvocationTarget, invocation.ReturnValue });Di2015NewLine      foreach (var element in enumerable)Di2015NewLine                yield return (T)element;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine hasConnection.Connection = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13425701Di2015UniqueSeparator//FieldsDi2015NewLineTexture2D object;Di2015NewLineVector2 object_position;Di2015NewLineRectangle collisionRectangle;Di2015NewLineMouseState preMouse;Di2015NewLinebool moving = false;Di2015NewLineVector2 mouseOffset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//initialize fields in LoadContent methodDi2015NewLineprotected override void LoadContent()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object = Content.Load<Texture2D>("nameOfYourImage");Di2015NewLine    object_position = new Vector2((graphics.PreferredBackBufferWidth - object.Width)/2, graphics.PreferredBackBufferHeight - object.Height - 60);Di2015NewLine    collisionRectangle = new Rectangle((int)object_position.X, (int)object_position.Y, (int)object.Width, (int)object.Height);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//add code to Update methodDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void MouseInput(MouseState mouse)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (collsionRectangle.Contains(mouse.X, mouse.Y) && //mouse is over the objectDi2015NewLine        //the user is clicking the left mousebuttonDi2015NewLine        mouse.LeftButton == ButtonState.Pressed && Di2015NewLine        //in the previous Update() call the left mousebutton was released, Di2015NewLine        //meaning the user has just clicked the objectDi2015NewLine        preMouse.LeftButton == ButtonState.Released)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        moving = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //stores what the objects position should be offset by so it doesn'tDi2015NewLine        //snap to the mouse's position every time you click on itDi2015NewLine        mouseOffset = new Vector2(Position.X - mouse.X, Position.Y - mouse.Y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (moving)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //if the player stops holding down the mousebutton i.e stops moving the objectDi2015NewLine        if (mouse.LeftButton == ButtonState.Released)  Di2015NewLine            moving = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //modifies the positionDi2015NewLine        Position.X = mouse.X + mouseOffset.X;Di2015NewLine        Position.Y = mouse.Y + mouseOffset.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //prevents object from going off the screen and getting lostDi2015NewLine        if (Convert.ToInt32(object_position.X) < 0)Di2015NewLine            object_position.X = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (object_position.X + object.Width > graphics.PreferredBackBufferWidth)Di2015NewLine            object_position.X = graphics.PreferredBackBufferWidth - object.Width;Di2015NewLine        if (Convert.ToInt32(object_position.Y) < 0)Di2015NewLine            object_position.Y = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (object_position.Y + object.Height > graphics.PreferredBackBufferHeight)Di2015NewLine            object_position.Y = graphics.PreferredBackBufferHeight - object.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //updates the collision rectangleDi2015NewLine        collisionRectangle = new Rectangle(Postion.X, Position.Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    preMouse = mouse; //stores the current mouseState for use in the next Update() callDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13426249Di2015UniqueSeparator(0)<0>:     (?im)(?<x>\\b[a-s03]+\\b)(?-i)(?<a>\\p{L}+?,(?<b>.+?:(?'c'.+?;(.+?(?:\\d|sample-text|(\\k'x'|sos30))))))Di2015NewLine(1)<x>:     \\b[a-s03]+\\bDi2015NewLine(2)<a>:     \\p{L}+?,(?<b>.+?:(?'c'.+?;(.+?(?:\\d|sample-text|(\\k'x'|sos30))))Di2015NewLine(3)<b>:     .+?:(?'c'.+?;(.+?(?:\\d|sample-text|(\\k'x'|sos30)))Di2015NewLine(4)<c>:     .+?;(.+?(?:\\d|sample-text|(\\k'x'|sos30))Di2015NewLine(5)<5>:     .+?(?:\\d|sample-text|(\\k'x'|sos30)Di2015NewLine(6)<6>:     \\k'x'|sos30Di2015NewLine
13426249Di2015UniqueSeparatorImports System.Collections.SpecializedDi2015NewLineModule Module1Di2015NewLinePublic DictGroups As New OrderedDictionaryDi2015NewLinePublic DictTrackers As New Dictionary(Of Integer, Boolean)Di2015NewLinePublic intGroups As Integer = 0Di2015NewLinePublic CommandGroup As Boolean = FalseDi2015NewLineSub Main()Di2015NewLine    Dim regexToEval As String = "(?im)(?<x>\\b[a-s03]+\\b)(?-i)(?<a>\\p{L}+?,(?<b>.+?:(?'c'.+?;(.+?(?:\\d|sample-text|(\\k'x'|sos30))))))"Di2015NewLine    Dim curChar As String = ""Di2015NewLine    DictGroups.Add(0, "(0)<0>: " & vbTab)Di2015NewLine    DictTrackers.Add(0, True)Di2015NewLine    For i = 1 To regexToEval.LengthDi2015NewLine        Dim iChar As String = regexToEval.Substring(i - 1, 1)Di2015NewLine        If curChar <> "\\" AndAlso iChar = ")" Then EndGroup()Di2015NewLine        AddStrToTrackers(iChar)Di2015NewLine        If curChar = "\\" OrElse iChar <> "(" OrElse regexToEval.Length < i + 2 Then curChar = iChar : Continue ForDi2015NewLine        If regexToEval.Substring(i, 1) = "?" ThenDi2015NewLine            i += 1 : AddStrToTrackers("?")Di2015NewLine            If regexToEval.Substring(i, 1) = ":" Then i += 1 : AddStrToTrackers(":") : curChar = ":" : Continue ForDi2015NewLine            Dim NameLength As Integer = 0Di2015NewLine            If regexToEval.Substring(i, 1) = "<" Or regexToEval.Substring(i, 1) = "'" ThenDi2015NewLine                i += 1 : AddStrToTrackers(regexToEval.Substring(i - 1, 1))Di2015NewLine                i += 1Di2015NewLine                For x = i To regexToEval.LengthDi2015NewLine                    If regexToEval.Substring(x - 1, 1) = ">" Or regexToEval.Substring(x - 1, 1) = "'" ThenDi2015NewLine                        NameLength = x - iDi2015NewLine                        Exit ForDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                NextDi2015NewLine            ElseDi2015NewLine                CommandGroup = TrueDi2015NewLine                Continue ForDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine            If NameLength > 0 ThenDi2015NewLine                Dim GroupName As String = regexToEval.Substring(i - 1, NameLength)Di2015NewLine                i += NameLength : curChar = regexToEval.Substring(i - 1, 1) : AddStrToTrackers(GroupName & curChar)Di2015NewLine                intGroups += 1Di2015NewLine                DictGroups.Add(intGroups, "(" & DictGroups.Count & ")<" & GroupName & ">: " & vbTab)Di2015NewLine                DictTrackers.Add(intGroups, True)Di2015NewLine                Continue ForDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine        curChar = iCharDi2015NewLine        intGroups += 1Di2015NewLine        DictGroups.Add(intGroups, "(" & DictGroups.Count & ")<" & intGroups.ToString & ">: " & vbTab)Di2015NewLine        DictTrackers.Add(intGroups, True)Di2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    Dim Output As String = MakeOutput()Di2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function MakeOutput() As StringDi2015NewLine    Dim retString As String = String.EmptyDi2015NewLine    For i = 0 To DictGroups.Count - 1Di2015NewLine        retString &= DictGroups(i) & vbCrLfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    Return retStringDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Sub EndGroup()Di2015NewLine    If CommandGroup ThenDi2015NewLine        CommandGroup = FalseDi2015NewLine        Exit SubDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine    Dim HighestNum As Integer = 0Di2015NewLine    For Each item In DictTrackersDi2015NewLine        If Not item.Value Then Continue ForDi2015NewLine        If item.Key > HighestNum Then HighestNum = item.KeyDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    If HighestNum <> 0 Then DictTrackers(HighestNum) = FalseDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Sub AddStrToTrackers(ByVal addString As String)Di2015NewLine    For Each item In DictTrackersDi2015NewLine        If item.Value Then DictGroups(item.Key) &= addStringDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineEnd ModuleDi2015NewLine

13428086Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void ExecuteQuery()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TableContinuationToken token = null;Di2015NewLine        TableRequestOptions reqOptions = new TableRequestOptions() { };Di2015NewLine        OperationContext ctx = new OperationContext() { ClientRequestID = "" };Di2015NewLine        long totalEntitiesRetrieved = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CloudTable table = cloudTableClient.GetTableReference("MyTable");Di2015NewLine            TableQuery<TempEntity> query = (new TableQuery<TempEntity>()).Take(100);Di2015NewLine            System.Threading.ManualResetEvent evt = new System.Threading.ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            var result = table.BeginExecuteQuerySegmented<TempEntity>(query, token, reqOptions, ctx, (o) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var response = (o.AsyncState as CloudTable).EndExecuteQuerySegmented<TempEntity>(o);Di2015NewLine                token = response.ContinuationToken;Di2015NewLine                int recordsRetrieved = response.Count();Di2015NewLine                totalEntitiesRetrieved += recordsRetrieved;Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Records retrieved in this attempt = " + recordsRetrieved + " | Total records retrieved = " + totalEntitiesRetrieved);Di2015NewLine                evt.Set();Di2015NewLine            }, table);Di2015NewLine            evt.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            if (token == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13428329Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool[] relFaces = new bool[6];Di2015NewLine        bool swapBool;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //start relFaces with the absolute faces.Di2015NewLine        //default value of bool is "FALSE"Di2015NewLine        if((l_shape & PosXFace) == PosXFace)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            relFaces[0] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if((l_shape & NegXFace) == NegXFace)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            relFaces[1] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if((l_shape & PosYFace) == PosYFace)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            relFaces[2] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if((l_shape & NegYFace) == NegYFace)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            relFaces[3] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if((l_shape & PosZFace) == PosZFace)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            relFaces[4] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if((l_shape & NegZFace) == NegZFace)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            relFaces[5] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // -z >> -xDi2015NewLine            swapBool = relFaces[1];Di2015NewLine            relFaces[1] = relFaces[5];Di2015NewLine            // +x >> -zDi2015NewLine            relFaces[5] = relFaces[0];Di2015NewLine            // +z >> +XDi2015NewLine            relFaces[0] = relFaces[4];Di2015NewLine            // -X >> +zDi2015NewLine            relFaces[4] = swapBool;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine

13430922Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask.Delay
13430922Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Task MyDelay(int milliseconds)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // There's only a generic TaskCompletionSource, but we don't reallyDi2015NewLine    // care about the result. Just use int as a reasonably cheap version.Di2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Timer timer = new Timer(_ => tcs.SetResult(0), null, milliseconds,Di2015NewLine                            Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine    // Capture the timer variable so that the timer can't be garbage collectedDi2015NewLine    // unless the task is (in which case it doesn't matter).Di2015NewLine    tcs.Task.ContinueWith(task => timer = null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13432983Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SqlIndexInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string IndexName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string TableName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string[] Fields { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsAscending { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsCompositeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return Fields.Length > 1; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static SqlIndexInfo ParseToIndexInfo(this string sql)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sql = sql.Trim();Di2015NewLine        var info = new SqlIndexInfo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var i = sql.IndexOf("CREATE INDEX", 0, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine        if (i < 0) throw new ArgumentException("String is not valid CREATE INDEX SQL");Di2015NewLine        var indexNameStart = i + "CREATE INDEX".Length + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        i = sql.IndexOf(" ON ", 0, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine        if (i < 0) throw new ArgumentException("String is not valid CREATE INDEX SQL");Di2015NewLine        var indexNameEnd = i;Di2015NewLine        var tableNameStart = i + " ON ".Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        i = sql.IndexOf("(", 0, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine        if (i < 0) throw new ArgumentException("String is not valid CREATE INDEX SQL");Di2015NewLine        var tableNameEnd = i;Di2015NewLine        var fieldNamesStart = i + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        i = sql.IndexOf(")", 0, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine        if (i < 0) throw new ArgumentException("String is not valid CREATE INDEX SQL");Di2015NewLine        var fieldNamesEnd = i;Di2015NewLine        var directionStart = i + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // TODO: strip brackets and/or single quotes?Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        info.IndexName = sql.Substring(indexNameStart, indexNameEnd - indexNameStart).Trim();Di2015NewLine        info.TableName = sql.Substring(tableNameStart, tableNameEnd - tableNameStart).Trim();Di2015NewLine        info.Fields = (from f in sql.Substring(fieldNamesStart, fieldNamesEnd - fieldNamesStart).Split(',')Di2015NewLine                      where !string.IsNullOrEmpty(f)Di2015NewLine                      select f.Trim()).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (directionStart >= sql.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            info.IsAscending = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            info.IsAscending = sql.IndexOf("ASC", directionStart, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) >= 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return info;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13435483Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class MyForm : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ScriptEngine m_engine;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ScriptScope m_scope;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyForm()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        m_engine = Python.CreateEngine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dynamic scope = m_scope = m_engine.CreateScope();Di2015NewLine        // add this form to the scopeDi2015NewLine        scope.form = this;Di2015NewLine        // add the proxy to the scopeDi2015NewLine        scope.proxy = CreateProxy();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // public so accessible from a IronPython scriptDi2015NewLine    public void ShowMessage(string message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // private so not accessible from a IronPython scriptDi2015NewLine    private int MyPrivateFunction()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Called MyForm.MyPrivateFunction");Di2015NewLine        return 42;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private object CreateProxy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // let's expose all methods we want to access from a scriptDi2015NewLine        dynamic proxy = new ExpandoObject();Di2015NewLine        proxy.ShowMessage = new Action<string>(ShowMessage);Di2015NewLine        proxy.MyPrivateFunction = new Func<int>(MyPrivateFunction);Di2015NewLine        return proxy;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13435483Di2015UniqueSeparatorproxy
13435483Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DoTests()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // try to call the methods on the form or proxy objectsDi2015NewLine    var script = @"Di2015NewLineform.ShowMessage('called form.ShowMessage')Di2015NewLine# formFuncResult = form.MyPrivateFunction() # fail, MyPrivateFunction is not accessibleDi2015NewLineproxy.ShowMessage('called proxy.ShowMessage')Di2015NewLineproxyFuncResult = proxy.MyPrivateFunction() # success, MyPrivateFunction on the proxy is accessibleDi2015NewLine";Di2015NewLine    m_engine.Execute(script, m_scope);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // access the scope through a dynamic variableDi2015NewLine    dynamic scope = m_scope;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get the proxyFuncResult variableDi2015NewLine    int proxyFuncResult = scope.proxyFuncResult;Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("proxyFuncResult variable: " + proxyFuncResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // call the the function on the proxy directlyDi2015NewLine    int directResult = scope.proxy.MyPrivateFunction();Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("result of MyPrivateFunction: " + directResult);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13435533Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PropertyChangedExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void RegisterPropertyHandler<T, TProperty>(this T obj, Expression<Func<T, TProperty>> propertyExpression, PropertyChangedEventHandler handlerDelegate)Di2015NewLine        where T : class, INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("obj");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var propertyName = GetPropertyName(propertyExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        obj.PropertyChanged += (sender, args) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (args.PropertyName == propertyName && handlerDelegate != null)Di2015NewLine                    handlerDelegate(sender, args);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Notify<T>(this PropertyChangedEventHandler eventHandler, object sender, Expression<Func<T>> propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = eventHandler;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null) handler(sender, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(GetPropertyName(propertyExpression)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetPropertyName(LambdaExpression propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = propertyExpression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (memberExpression == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = propertyExpression.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            if (unaryExpression == null) Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Expression must be a UnaryExpression.", "propertyExpression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memberExpression = unaryExpression.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (memberExpression == null) Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Expression must be a MemberExpression.", "propertyExpression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var propertyInfo = memberExpression.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine        if (propertyInfo == null) Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Expression must be a Property.", "propertyExpression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return propertyInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

   static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Byte[] data; // a variable to hold our desired data...Di2015NewLine            Win32Exception ex, ex2; //see using block belowDi2015NewLine            int outputBufferSize = 4096000;//just some buffer ... way to big, but hey ...Di2015NewLine            var unmanagedOutputBuffer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(outputBufferSize); // Marshal will give us an unmanaged buffer of desired size ... hopefullyDi2015NewLine            RAW_READ_INFO ri = new RAW_READ_INFO { DiskOffset = 0, SectorCount = 20, TrackMode = TRACK_MODE_TYPE.YellowMode2 }; // what do we want to read?Di2015NewLine            var ri_size = Marshal.SizeOf(ri); // since we are giving ri to an unmanaged function, we need to tell that function the size of riDi2015NewLine            int bytesReturned = 0; // if everything works as expected, we will get something written in our unmanaged buffer ... here we can store how many bytes were writtenDi2015NewLine            using (var hDev = CreateFile(@"\\\\.\\H:", EFileAccess.GenericRead, EFileShare.Read | EFileShare.Write, IntPtr.Zero, ECreationDisposition.OpenExisting, EFileAttributes.Normal, IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine            {// since we are working with a handle, we have to make sure we release it after we are done ... "using" does that for usDi2015NewLine                ex = new Win32Exception();//will tell you if CreateFile worked Di2015NewLine                var b = DeviceIoControl(hDev, IOCTL_CDROM_RAW_READ, ref ri, ri_size, unmanagedOutputBuffer, outputBufferSize, ref bytesReturned, IntPtr.Zero); // the magic happens hereDi2015NewLine                ex2 = new Win32Exception();//will tell you if DeviceIoControl workedDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (bytesReturned > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data = new byte[bytesReturned]; //this time, a managed buffer to hold our dataDi2015NewLine                Marshal.Copy(unmanagedOutputBuffer, data, 0, bytesReturned); // copy from unmanaged buffer to managed buffer (from the land of dragons and monsters into the .net world)Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeHGlobal(unmanagedOutputBuffer);//release the unmanaged bufferDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if everything worked as expected you should now have the first 20 sectors of a ordinary CD-Rom (Yellow Book - Mode 2) in the data array ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13441280Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void b_calculate_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < dataGridView1.RowCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dataGridView2.RowCount <= i)Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var cellFromDG1 = dataGridView1.Rows[i].Cells[0];Di2015NewLine        var cellFromDG2 = dataGridView1.Rows[i].Cells[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (cellFromDG1.Value == null || cellFromDG2.Value == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this could be the empty row that allows you toDi2015NewLine            // enter a new recordDi2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var value = cellFromDG1.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine        var value2 = cellFromDG2.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((value == "AT1" || value == "AE0" || value == "AT2") &&Di2015NewLine                (value2 == "BT1" || value2 == "BE0"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gottoFunction1();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((value == "AT1" || value == "AT2") &&Di2015NewLine            (value2 == "BT1" || value2 == "BT2"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gottoFunction2();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13441369Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar IV = new byte[8];//empty byte arrayDi2015NewLinevar key = new byte[] { 0x01, 0x23, 0x45, 0x67, 0x89, 0xab, 0xcd, 0xef };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar data = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("7654321 Now is the time for ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDES DESalg = DES.Create();Di2015NewLineDESalg.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLineDESalg.Padding = PaddingMode.None;Di2015NewLineICryptoTransform crypt = DESalg.CreateEncryptor(key, IV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar result = new byte[8];Di2015NewLineint LoopCount = data.Length / 8;Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < LoopCount; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("=============Round {0}==============", i + 1);Di2015NewLine    byte[] part = new byte[8];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(data, i * 8, part, 0, 8);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Plain text : {0}", ByteArrayToString(part));Di2015NewLine    part = XorArray(part, result);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("DES INPUT  : {0}", ByteArrayToString(part));Di2015NewLine    result = EncryptPart(crypt, part);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineint remain = data.Length % 8;Di2015NewLineif (remain != 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("===========Final Round==============");Di2015NewLine    byte[] LastPart = new byte[8];//Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(data, data.Length - remain, LastPart, 0, remain);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Plain text : " + ByteArrayToString(LastPart));Di2015NewLine    LastPart = XorArray(LastPart, result);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("DES INPUT  : " + ByteArrayToString(LastPart));Di2015NewLine    result = EncryptPart(crypt, LastPart);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Result: {0}", ByteArrayToString(result));Di2015NewLine
13441369Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] EncryptPart(ICryptoTransform crypt, byte[] toEncrypt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream mStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CryptoStream cStream = new CryptoStream(mStream,Di2015NewLine            crypt,Di2015NewLine            CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine        cStream.Write(toEncrypt, 0, toEncrypt.Length);Di2015NewLine        cStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine        byte[] ret = mStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        cStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        mStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("DES OUTPUT : " + ByteArrayToString(ret));Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    catch (CryptographicException e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("A Cryptographic error occurred: {0}", e.Message);Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13443172Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Controls;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Media;Di2015NewLineusing static void FlipItem(UIElement over, UIElement under, Directions direction = Directions.LeftToRight, int duration = 200)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // setup visible planeDi2015NewLine under.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLine        under.Projection = new PlaneProjection { CenterOfRotationY = 0 };Di2015NewLineÂ Di2015NewLine        // gen storyboardDi2015NewLine        var _StoryBoard = new System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard();Di2015NewLine        var _Duration = TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(duration);Di2015NewLineÂ Di2015NewLine        // add animation: hide-n-show itemsDi2015NewLine        _StoryBoard.Children.Add(CreateVisibility(_Duration, over, false));Di2015NewLine        _StoryBoard.Children.Add(CreateVisibility(_Duration, under, _StoryBoard.Children.Add(CreateRotation(_Duration, 0, 90, 180, (PlaneProjection)over.Projection));Di2015NewLine            _StoryBoard.Children.Add(CreateRotation(_Duration, -180, -90, 0,   private static DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames CreateRotation(TimeSpan duration, double degreesFrom, double degreesMid, double degreesTo, PlaneProjection projection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var _One = new EasingDoubleKeyFrame { KeyTime = new TimeSpan(0), Value = degreesFrom, EasingFunction = new CubicEase() { EasingMode = EasingMode.EaseIn } };Di2015NewLine        var _Two = new EasingDoubleKeyFrame { KeyTime = new TimeSpan(duration.Ticks / 2), Value = degreesMid, EasingFunction = new CubicEase() { EasingMode = EasingMode.EaseIn } };Di2015NewLine        var _Three = new EasingDoubleKeyFrame { KeyTime = new TimeSpan(duration.Ticks), Value = degreesTo, EasingFunction = new CubicEase() { EasingMode = EasingMode.EaseOut } };Di2015NewLineÂ Di2015NewLine        var    _Animation.KeyFrames.Add(_Three);Di2015NewLine        Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(_Animation, new PropertyPath("RotationY"));Di2015NewLine        Storyboard.SetTarget(_Animation, 13453637Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic async void RoamData()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var roamingFolder = Windows.Storage.ApplicationData.Current.RoamingFolder;Di2015NewLine    var needToCreate = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sampleFile = await roamingFolder.GetFileAsync("dataFile.txt");Di2015NewLine        string fooBar = await Windows.Storage.FileIO.ReadTextAsync(sampleFile);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // fooBar not foundDi2015NewLine        needToCreate = true; // set a boolean to create the file. 13453642Di2015UniqueSeparatorConcurrentDictionary<Tuple<string, string, string>, SomeObject>
13453642Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing MyDict = ConcurrentDictionary<Tuple<string, string, string>, SomeObject>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMyDict Merge(IEnumerable<MyDict> dicts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MyDict result = new MyDict();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var dict in dicts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var kvp in dict)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.AddOrUpdate(Di2015NewLine                kvp.Key,        // If the key does not exist, add the value;Di2015NewLine                kvp.Value,      // otherwise, combine the two values.Di2015NewLine                (key, value) => Combine(value, kvp.Value)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13455420Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Mvc;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Routing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ********.CodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class CustomRouteConstraint : IRouteConstraintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static string controllerNamespace;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RoutePatternCollection patternCollection { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="CustomRouteConstraint"/> class.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="rPC">The route pattern collection to match.</param>Di2015NewLine        public CustomRouteConstraint(RoutePatternCollection rPC)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.patternCollection = rPC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(controllerNamespace)) {Di2015NewLine                controllerNamespace = Assembly.GetCallingAssembly().FullName.Split(new string[1] {","}, StringSplitOptions.None)Di2015NewLine                    .FirstOrDefault().Trim().ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Sets the controller namespace. Should be called before RegisterRoutes.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="_namespace">The namespace.</param>Di2015NewLine        public static void SetControllerNamespace(string _namespace)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            controllerNamespace = _namespace;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Attempts to match the current request to an action with the constraint pattern.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="httpContext">The current HTTPContext of the request.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="route">The route to which the constraint belongs.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="paramName">Name of the parameter (irrelevant).</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="values">The url values to attempt to match.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="routeDirection">The route direction (this method will ignore URL Generations).</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if a match has been found, false otherwise.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public bool Match(HttpContextBase httpContext, Route route, string paramName, RouteValueDictionary values, RouteDirection routeDirection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (routeDirection.Equals(RouteDirection.UrlGeneration)) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, object> unMappedList = values.Where(x => x.Key.Contains("param")).OrderBy(xi => xi.Key).ToDictionary(Di2015NewLine                kvp => kvp.Key, kvp => kvp.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string controller = values["controller"] as string;Di2015NewLine            string action = values["action"] as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Type cont = TryFindController(controller);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (cont != null) {Di2015NewLine                MethodInfo actionMethod = cont.GetMethod(action);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (actionMethod != null) {Di2015NewLine                    ParameterInfo[] methodParameters = actionMethod.GetParameters();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (validateParameters(methodParameters, unMappedList)) {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < methodParameters.Length; i++) {                            Di2015NewLine                            var key = unMappedList.ElementAt(i).Key;Di2015NewLine                            var value = values[key];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            values.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine                            values.Add(methodParameters.ElementAt(i).Name, value);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Validates the parameter lists.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="methodParameters">The method parameters for the found action.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="values">The parameters from the RouteValueDictionary.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if the parameters all match, false if otherwise.</returns>Di2015NewLine        private bool validateParameters(ParameterInfo[] methodParameters, Dictionary<string, object> values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //@TODO add flexibility for optional parametersDi2015NewLine            if (methodParameters.Count() != patternCollection.parameters.Count()) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < methodParameters.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                if (!matchType(methodParameters[i], patternCollection.parameters.ElementAt(i), values.ElementAt(i).Value)) {Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Matches the type of the found action parameter to the expected parameter, also attempts data conversion.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="actualParam">The actual parameter of the found action.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="expectedParam">The expected parameter.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="value">The value of the RouteValueDictionary corresponding to that parameter.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if the parameters match, false if otherwise.</returns>Di2015NewLine        private bool matchType(ParameterInfo actualParam, ParamType expectedParam, object value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                switch (expectedParam) {Di2015NewLine                    case ParamType.BOOL:Di2015NewLine                        switch (actualParam.ParameterType.ToString()) {Di2015NewLine                            case "System.Boolean":Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToBoolean(value);Di2015NewLine                                return true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            default:Di2015NewLine                                return false;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case ParamType.DOUBLE:Di2015NewLine                        switch (actualParam.ParameterType.ToString()) {Di2015NewLine                            case "System.Double":Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToDouble(value);Di2015NewLine                                return true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            case "System.Decimal":Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToDecimal(value);Di2015NewLine                                return true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            default:Di2015NewLine                                return false;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case ParamType.INT:Di2015NewLine                        switch (actualParam.ParameterType.ToString()) {Di2015NewLine                            case "System.Int32":Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToInt32(value);Di2015NewLine                                return true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            case "System.Int16":Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToInt16(value);                                Di2015NewLine                                return true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            default:Di2015NewLine                                return false;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case ParamType.LONG:Di2015NewLine                        switch (actualParam.ParameterType.ToString()) {Di2015NewLine                            case "System.Int64":Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToInt64(value);Di2015NewLine                                return true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            default:Di2015NewLine                                return false;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            default:Di2015NewLine                                return false;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case ParamType.UINT:Di2015NewLine              Convert.ToUInt64(value);Di2015NewLine                                return true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } catch (Exception) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Attempts to discover a controller matching the one specified in the route.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="_controllerName">Name of the controller.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A System.Type containing the found controller, or null if the contoller cannot be discovered.</returns>Di2015NewLine        private Type TryFindController(string _controllerName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string controllerFullName;Di2015NewLine            Assembly executingAssembly = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(controllerNamespace)) {Di2015NewLine                controllerFullName = string.Format(controllerNamespace + ".Controllers.{0}Controller", _controllerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Type controller = executingAssembly.GetType(controllerFullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (controller == null) {Di2015NewLine                    if (controllerNamespace.Contains("Controllers")) {Di2015NewLine                        controllerFullName = string.Format(controllerNamespace + ".{0}Controller", _controllerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if ((controller = executingAssembly.GetType(controllerFullName)) == null) {Di2015NewLine                            controllerFullName = string.Format(controllerNamespace + ".{0}", _controllerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            controller = executingAssembly.GetType(controllerFullName);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    } else {Di2015NewLine                        controllerFullName = string.Format(controllerNamespace + "Controllers.{0}", _controllerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        controller = executingAssembly.GetType(controllerFullName);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return controller;Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                controllerFullName = string.Format(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().FullName.Split(new string[1] {","}, StringSplitOptions.None)Di2015NewLine                    .FirstOrDefault().Trim().ToString() + ".Controllers.{0}Controller", _controllerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetType(controllerFullName);Di2015NewLine            }            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine
