13458112Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DataContextProxyBehavior : Behavior<FrameworkElement>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Object DataSourceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (Object)GetValue(DataSourceProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(DataSourceProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty DataSourceProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("DataSource", typeof(Object), typeof(DataContextProxy), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnAttached()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnAttached();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Binds the target datacontext to the proxy,Di2015NewLine        // so whenever it changes the proxy will be updatedDi2015NewLine        var binding = new Binding();Di2015NewLine        binding.Source = this.AssociatedObject;Di2015NewLine        binding.Path = new PropertyPath("DataContext");Di2015NewLine        binding.Mode = BindingMode.OneWay;Di2015NewLine        BindingOperations.SetBinding(this, DataContextProxyBehavior.DataSourceProperty, binding);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the proxy to the resource collection of the targetDi2015NewLine        // so it will be available to nested controlsDi2015NewLine        this.AssociatedObject.Resources.Add(Di2015NewLine            "DataContextProxy",Di2015NewLine            thisDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnDetaching()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnDetaching();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Removes the proxy from the ResourcesDi2015NewLine        this.AssociatedObject.Resources.Remove(Di2015NewLine            "DataContextProxy"Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

  private Image _yellowImage; Di2015NewLine        private Image _redImage; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int _pingCount;Di2015NewLine        private long _avgRtt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Form2()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine            IPAddress.TryParse("98.138.253.109", out _ipAddress); // yahoo.com Ip addressDi2015NewLine            _timer = new Timer();Di2015NewLine            _timeout = 3000;Di2015NewLine            _pingClass = new Ping();Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine            RefreshPing(e.Reply);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void FormLoad(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine pingReply)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            label4.Text = (pingReply.RoundtripTime.ToString(CultureInfo.InstalledUICulture));Di2015NewLine            label5.Text = (pingReply.Status.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _avgRtt = (_avgRtt * _pingCount++ + pingReply.RoundtripTime)/_pingCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Convert.ToInt32(label4.Text) > 0 && Convert.ToInt32(label4.Text) < 100)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SetImage(pictureBox1, Images.Green);Di2015NewLine 13466287Di2015UniqueSeparator//using short scale: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Long_and_short_scales#ComparisonDi2015NewLineconst decimal HundredThousand = 100 * 1000;Di2015NewLineconst decimal Million = HundredThousand * 10;Di2015NewLineconst decimal Billion = Million * 1000; //short scaleDi2015NewLineconst decimal Trillion = Billion * 1000; //short scaleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst string NumberFormatKilo = "{0:##,#,.## K;- ##,#,.## K;0}";Di2015NewLineconst string NumberFormatMillion = "{0:##,#,,.## M;- ##,#,,.## M;0}";Di2015NewLineconst string NumberFormatBillion = "{0:##,#,,,.## B;- ##,#,,,.## B;0}";Di2015NewLineconst string NumberFormatTrillion = "{0:##,#,,,,.## T;- ##,#,,,,.## T;0}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic decimal Size Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    get; set;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string SizeFormatted Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    get Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var format = GetUpdatedNumberFormat(Size);Di2015NewLine        return string.Format(format, Size);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string GetUpdatedNumberFormat(decimal value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string format = NumberFormat;Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(value) >= Constants.Trillion)Di2015NewLine        format = NumberFormatTrillion;Di2015NewLine    else if (Math.Abs(value) >= Constants.Billion)Di2015NewLine        format = NumberFormatBillion;Di2015NewLine    else if (Math.Abs(value) >= Constants.Million)Di2015NewLine        format = NumberFormatMillion;Di2015NewLine    else if (Math.Abs(value) >= Constants.HundredThousand)Di2015NewLine        format = NumberFormatKilo;Di2015NewLine    return format;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13470698Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Filter {Di2015NewLine    public String Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public String Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Comparer : IEqualityComparer<Filter>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public bool Equals(Filter x, Filter y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if(ReferenceEquals(x, y))Di2015NewLine               return true;Di2015NewLine           else if(x==null || y==null)Di2015NewLine               return false;Di2015NewLine           return x.Name  == y.NameDi2015NewLine               && x.Value == y.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int GetHashCode(Filter obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            unchecked Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int hash = 17;Di2015NewLine                hash = hash * 23 + obj.Name.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine                hash = hash * 23 + obj.Value.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine                return hash;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13471542Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AppHost : AppHostHttpListenerBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public AppHost() : base("Service", typeof(AppHost).Assembly) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Configure(Funq.Container container)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Plugins.Add(new RazorFormat());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void AddP12 (string filename, string password, ushort port)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string dirname = Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.ApplicationData);Di2015NewLine        string path = Path.Combine(dirname, ".mono");Di2015NewLine        path = Path.Combine(path, "httplistener");Di2015NewLine        if (!Directory.Exists(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Creating directory: " + path);Di2015NewLine            Directory.CreateDirectory(path);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        X509Certificate2 x509 = null;Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            x509 = new X509Certificate2 (filename, password);Di2015NewLine        } catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine            Console.Error.WriteLine ("error loading certificate [{0}]", e.Message);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string target_cert = Path.Combine (path, String.Format ("{0}.cer", port));Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(target_cert)) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Error.WriteLine ("error: there is already a certificate for that port.");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string target_pvk = Path.Combine (path, String.Format ("{0}.pvk", port));Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(target_pvk)) {Di2015NewLine            Console.Error.WriteLine ("error: there is already a certificate for that port.");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Stream cer = File.OpenWrite (target_cert)) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] raw = x509.RawData;Di2015NewLine            cer.Write (raw, 0, raw.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PrivateKey pvk = new PrivateKey();Di2015NewLine        pvk.RSA = x509.PrivateKey as RSA;Di2015NewLine        pvk.Save(target_pvk);           Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string listeningOn = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        if (args.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine            listeningOn = "http://*:" + args[0] + "/";Di2015NewLine        else if (args.Length == 3)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            listeningOn = "https://*:" + args[0] + "/";Di2015NewLine            AddP12(args[1], args[2], Convert.ToUInt16(args[0]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Usage: [port] [p12 certificate] [p12 password]");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        AppHost appHost = new AppHost();Di2015NewLine        appHost.Init();Di2015NewLine        appHost.Start(listeningOn);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Service Stack Server 13473314Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class SearchResults : System.Web.UI.PageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private class SomeSearchableClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The autocomplete plugin defaults to using the querystringDi2015NewLine        // parameter "term". 13473758Di2015UniqueSeparator [ValueConversion(typeof(DateTime), typeof(string))]Di2015NewLine    public class StringTime : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region IValueConverter MembersDi2015NewLine        public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value == null || value.ToString() == "")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return "";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            String str = ((DateTime)value).ToString("hh:mm tt");Di2015NewLine            return str;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value == null || value.ToString() == "")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            DateTime dtr = DateTime.MinValue.Date;Di2015NewLine            dtr = dtr.AddYears(1899);Di2015NewLine            if (value == null)Di2015NewLine                return dtr;Di2015NewLine            dtr = dtr.AddHours(double.Parse((value.ToString().Substring(0, 2))));Di2015NewLine            dtr = dtr.AddMinutes(double.Parse((value.ToString().Substring(3, 2))));Di2015NewLine            if(value.ToString().Substring(7, 2) == "PM")Di2015NewLine                dtr = dtr.AddHours(12);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return dtr;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13474378Di2015UniqueSeparatorWebRequest
13474378Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string url = "http://tinyurl.com/so-hints";Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(LengthenUrl(url));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static string LengthenUrl(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = WebRequest.CreateHttp(url);Di2015NewLine        request.AllowAutoRedirect = false;Di2015NewLine        using (var response = request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var status = ((HttpWebResponse) response).StatusCode;Di2015NewLine            if (status == HttpStatusCode.Moved ||Di2015NewLine                status == HttpStatusCode.MovedPermanently)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return response.Headers["Location"];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // TODO: Work out a better exceptionDi2015NewLine            throw new Exception("No redirect required.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13474381Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (ParameterFieldDefinition param in clsCrystal.cryRtp.DataDefinition.ParameterFields)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (param.Name.Equals("ShowUp"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (ParameterValue parameterValue in param.DefaultValues)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!parameterValue.IsRange)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ParameterDiscreteValue parameterDiscreteValue = (ParameterDiscreteValue)parameterValue;Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show(parameterDiscreteValue.Description);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13474465Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var a = new int?[] {150, 100, 70, 30, 20 };Di2015NewLine    var b = new int?[] {300, 200, 100, 70, 60, 50, 20 };Di2015NewLine    var result = IndexDelta(a, b);Di2015NewLine    result.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLineIObservable<Tuple<int, bool>> IndexDelta(IEnumerable<int?> a, IEnumerable<int?> b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var observable = Observable.Create<Tuple<int, bool>>(o => {Di2015NewLine        var indexA = 0;Di2015NewLine        var indexB = 0;Di2015NewLine        var aEnumerator = a.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        var bEnumerator = b.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        var aHasNext = aEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        var bHasNext = bEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(true) {Di2015NewLine            if (aHasNext == false && bHasNext == false) {Di2015NewLine                "Completed".Dump();Di2015NewLine                o.OnCompleted(); // both sequences are overDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var headA = aEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            var headB = bEnumerator.Current; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            headA.Dump("A");Di2015NewLine            headB.Dump("B");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Action reportDeletion = () => {Di2015NewLine                o.OnNext(Tuple.Create(indexA, false));Di2015NewLine                aHasNext = aEnumerator.MoveNext(); // this one is fastDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            Action reportInsertion = () => {Di2015NewLine                o.OnNext(Tuple.Create(indexB, true));Di2015NewLine                bHasNext = bEnumerator.MoveNext(); // can take a long timeDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (headA == null) { // No source item at this positionDi2015NewLine                reportInsertion();Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (headB == null) { // No fetched item at this positionDi2015NewLine                reportDeletion();Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (headB.Value.CompareTo(headA.Value)) {Di2015NewLine                case 0:     Di2015NewLine                    aHasNext = aEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine                    bHasNext = bEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine                    indexA++;Di2015NewLine                    indexB++;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 1: // Fetched item is newer than source itemDi2015NewLine                    reportInsertion();Di2015NewLine                    indexB++;Di2015NewLine                    break; Di2015NewLine                case -1: // Source item is newer than fetched itemDi2015NewLine                    reportDeletion();Di2015NewLine                    indexA++;Di2015NewLine                    break; Di2015NewLine            }           Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine    });     Di2015NewLine    return observable;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

13476911Di2015UniqueSeparator//asuming your db has these fields: db.Shifts, db.OperatorShiftsDi2015NewLine//and model is the current OperatorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar existingShifts = (from os in db.OperatorShiftsDi2015NewLine                where os.OperatorId == model.IdDi2015NewLine                select os).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<Guid> newShiftIds = ?; //don't now how your selected shift ids got post back, figure it out yourselfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar shiftsToRemove = existingShifts.Where(e => newShiftIds.All(id => e.Id != id)).ToList();Di2015NewLinevar shiftIdsToAppend = newShiftIds.Where(id => exising.All(e => e.Id != id)).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(var shift in shiftsToRemove)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    db.OperatorShifts.Remove(shift);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(var shiftId in shiftIdsToAppend)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    db.OperatorShifts.Add(new OperatorShift{Di2015NewLine        OperatorId = model.Id,Di2015NewLine        ShiftId = shiftIdDi2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
